name: 10 secs from Jordan Station, huge beds
summary: Nestled in the heart of Kowloon, Hakkas is home to a community of the city's best and most vibrant urban life.  Get a taste of the classic dystopian tale and get lost in this mysterious part of Kowloon with us. 10 minutes walking distance: Tsim Sha Tsui (Star Ferry Pier, Victoria Harbour, Chung King Mansion), Yau Ma Tei (Temple Street, Fruit Market), Mong Kok (Goldfish Street/Tung Choi Street), Kowloon Mosque And Islamic Centre, Kowloon Park
space: Hakkas Guesthouse, with its best location, is the priority choice of those who plan to spend only several days in Hong Kong but are ambitious to see the most of the place. Staying in Hakkas leads to you the most exotic experience you may ever have in Hong Kong.  From traditional Chinese temples, the Wong Kar-wai's Chung King Mansion to post-modern skyscrapers, from Harbour to the Peak, Hakkas presents to you the dreamy taste of both the center and the fringe.

neighborhood_overview: From Blade Runner (1982) to Ghost in the Shell (1995), makers of science fiction films like to model their cityscapes after Hong Kong, especially Kowloon, because of its unique urban landscape: a densely packed, constantly evolving city, where old meets new and cultures clash.  Get a taste of the classic dystopian tale and get lost in this mysterious part of Kowloon with us. Take 15 minutes metro to Central (the Peak Tram, the Hong Kong Observation Wheel, the IFC (Apple Store), the Court of Final Appeal, the City Hall Public Library, the Hong Kong Zoological and Botanical Gardens, the Fringe), Causeway Bay (SOGO, Apple Store, Victoria Park, IKEA store), Sham Shui Po (Lei Cheng Uk Han Tomb), Kowloon City (Remnants of the South Gate of Kowloon Walled City, Kowloon Walled City Park) Take 20 minutes metro to the Ocean Park
notes: Hakkas is a licensed guesthouse.
transit: RAIL - How to arrive at Hakkas from Airport by rail (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Method No. 1: 1.       Take the Airport Express (rail) from the Airport to TSING YI station (14 minutes ride), 2.       Switch to the orange line (the Tung Chung Line, to Hong Kong direction, not to Tung Chung direction) and go to LAI KING Station (5 minutes ride).  3.       Switch to the red line (the Tsuen Wan Line, to Central direction, not to Tsuen Wan direction) at LAI KING Station, and go to JORDAN Station (17 minutes ride).  4.       Take Exit B1 of JORDAN station and you will see us right there.  5.       Cost: HK$81.5, equivalent to USD 10.4 – tax free; Time: around 50 minutes including walking Method No. 2: 1.       Take the Airport Express (rail) from the Airport to KOWLOON station (22 minutes ride, HK$105); 2.       Leave the KOWLOON station and take a taxi to Hakkas (you may tell taxi driver to drop you at “Jordan MTR Exit B1” or “YueHwa Shopping Mall (裕華國貨) of Jordan” (20 minutes ride, around

neighborhood_overview: Quartier résidentiel de choix au coeur de Montréal. Le secteur saint-Leonard  vous donnera la chance de découvrir plusieurs services multiethniques. Tranquillité et accessibilité seront au rendez-vous. Le stationnement est gratuit sur les rues du quartier( respecter tout de même la signalisation en cours).
notes: Le respect et la tranquillité avec les autres locataires Airbnb qui séjournent dans le bloc d'appartement est de mise. Aucune nuisance sonore n'est tolérée.
transit: Le transport en commun est le moyen de choix pour vos déplacements sur l'ensemble du territoire montréalais. Pour les amateurs du vélo, plusieurs pistes cyclables vous sont accessibles pour vous permettre de découvrir des endroits peu connus. L'automobile est également un moyen efficace pour les déplacements mais prévoyez un budget pour le stationnement surtout au centre ville.

reviews.comments: This is a beautiful and very well located apartment which is full of personal memorabilia and makes for a superb place to use as a base out of Central. The location and building are fantastic. The pool was actually closed for the winter, but we did make use of the rooftop and gym with a little organising with very nice building management team. The apartment is actually someones permenant home and not a proper rental. As such it was very cluttered and not clean. To be honest next time I'd have rather paid 20% more and stay in a hotel.

There is a basketball court in the lower part of Abbasağa Park. This is also filled by young people and children around the clock. reviews.comments: Rıdvan is so helpful and kind. He help me about everything. House is so cute and enough for 2 person. Location is great.  5 minutes from home to Bosphorus with walk. 30 minutes to sultan ahmet square. 30 minutes to kadıköy. 20 minutes to taksim square. Thanks for everything.

Great Location in a quiet streets up on hills few minutes walk  from the lively besiktas streets , where you can find cafés , restaurants and shops and all kind of transportation.

Ridvan waited for us and was very patient even if we had a late check in. He replied quicly to all our msgs and questions.
Good experience and comfortable stay.

Rıdvan's place was just as expected. Very clean and cozy for 2. Would recommend and would certainly stay again. Location was perfect. 


 Ev sahibi çok yardımsever ve ulaşılabilirdi. Evin yeri merkezi ve her şey dairede tamdı. Acil yardım çantası bile evde vardı. Mutfak malzemeleri tam ve temizdi. 2 Kişi için ideal bir yer. Tavsiye ederim.

Ridvan was an amazing host! The place was super cute, had everything I needed to feel at home and was close to a sweet little neighborhood. Ridvan was super helpful, accommodating and answered all of my questions quickly. He came by immediately when I needed the hot water turned on and even brought a traditional Turkish drink to enjoy. Very nice person,  lovey space and generally a great experience!

Добрый день! Квартира находится в отличном районе! Близко транспорт, есть рядом магазины и кафе. Не понравилось, что не было чистых и сухих полотенец. Пришлось покупать себе своё. Что касается хозяина, мне не понравилось его отношение к русским девушкам. Я приезжала в Стамбул одна. И для меня были очень навязчивыми его визиты ко мне под различными предлогами. И от него поступали неприличные предложения интимного характера, что для меня было неприемлемым. Я с этим столкнулась впервые, не чувствовала себя в безопасности в квартире.

Had such a great experience while staying a ridvans place. Very cozy, clean, he was very communicative and the location was great as well. It was a breath of fresh air and a nice break from the hustle and bustle of Taksim square. Wish I could have stayed longer! Felt safe and a quick walk to the Beşiktaş center(felt more of a local neighborhood than touristy) which I liked and close to the seaside.

The Flat is exactly as the description, our stay was great! The flat was very clean. Rıdvan is really reactive, and helpful. 
The situation is very central, you can find absolutely everything you will need from a walking distance. 
Will definitely stay here again.
Clean space and as described

neighborhood_overview: Lilyfield is located in Sydney's cultural Inner West. On the cusp of Annandale and Leichhardt it is surrounded by parks, a walk around the harbour to Sydney's Fish Markets. Close to Newtown, Surry Hills and Redfern.
notes: PUBLIC TRANSPORT NOTES LIGHT RAIL  700 M walk to Rozelle Bay Light Rail (station) The light rail comes every 10-15 minutes during the week and 15-25 minutes on weekends. It is about 30 minute ride to the city.  The light rail stops at: The fish markets, Paddy's markets, The Star, Darling Harbour, Central Station (where you can get buses and trains to anywhere around Sydney)  (website hidden) BUSES The nearest bus stop is about a 5 minute walk, which is on Booth street near Johnston street.  The 470 takes you into the city which takes about 25-30 minutes The 370 takes you to Newtown 20-25 minutes bus ride.  Newtown has multiple cafes, bars, restaurants, pubs and is good for shopping. It also has multiple buses and trains which can take you all over the city and surrounding areas. Bus timetable/trip planner  - (website hidden)_DM_REQUEST
transit: Very accessible to public transport and local taxi services. 15minute bus ride into the city and Newtown. $20-$30 Uber/Cab ride home from the city. Approx. half an hour drive to Sydny's iconic Bondi or Manly beach.
access: Wi-fi internet, TV and dvd's.  Close to bus and light rail routes. They will have access to a fully equipped kitchen. Aircon. Courtyard and balcony. Internal laundry. Strictly no animals or smoking.
interaction: I can give further details or if any questions are needed please feel free to email.
house_rules: Strictly no smoking No pets No extra guests.  $70 cleaning fee

host.host_about:
Born and raised on Sydney, Australia - I moved to Brooklyn 2 years ago with my partner.

We absolutely love our apartment and area :)

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Katie was an absolute pleasure to deal with and made it easy to book, gain access and use her fantastic apartment.  Couldn't have been easier.  We were a couple with two young kids, the living space is amazing and very big, it has a real New York loft feel with an amazing style - something for everyone.  Plenty of bathrooms and two good size double rooms.  A 5 minute walk to the light rail and 10mins to all the inner west can offer.  It was perfect for what we need: a home in Annandale/Lilyfield whilst we were between houses - thank you.
Beautiful, clean, amazing apartment! Everything as described and would highly recommend it!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Katie's apartment! We felt right at home throughout our whole stay; the space was clean and tidy, and the home décor was intriguing! The location was absolutely perfect for us. There were plenty of lovely coffee shops and restaurants in the area, and it was just a short 10 minute drive to the heart of all of Sydney's finest attractions. 

We would certainly recommend Katie's apartment to anyone looking for a wonderful, relaxing time in the outskirts of Sydney's CBD! Katie's hospitality was seamless, and she was helpful and informative throughout the whole process!

Thanks again Katie!

name: Bright Quiet Room in the W Village
summary: This charming, clean & quiet oasis is located right in the center of everything that's amazing about the W. Village.  On the second floor, the double bed comfortably fits two. The private toilet is in the hallway, which is actually perfect.
space: Most apartment buildings have been renovated beyond recognition. This apartment has had the same layout since it was built. The paint is fresh, but you can still feel the old NYC, when the W Village was all struggling artists & people who eventually made history.
description: This charming, clean & quiet oasis is located right in the center of everything that's amazing about the W. Village.  On the second floor, the double bed comfortably fits two. The private toilet is in the hallway, which is actually perfect. Most apartment buildings have been renovated beyond recognition. This apartment has had the same layout since it was built. The paint is fresh, but you can still feel the old NYC, when the W Village was all struggling artists & people who eventually made history. You'll have your own private bedroom. You'll be sharing my kitchen which has the shower in it. We have a private toilet in the hall but we don't share it with any other apartments, but it is in the hall. I'm friendly, but I'm a working comic so I perform most nights. Come see me perform!  I love Reggio Cafe, Washington Square Park &  being so close to so many amazing comedy clubs. The Vietnamese place & crepe place right under my building are addictive. I'm a 3 minute walk away from the ACE
neighborhood_overview: I love Reggio Cafe, Washington Square Park &  being so close to so many amazing comedy clubs. The Vietnamese place & crepe place right under my building are addictive.
notes: The best food, entertainment and people watching in NYC is just a few steps from my stoop.
transit: I'm a 3 minute walk away from the ACE & BDFM train & an 8 minute walk to the 1 train. You can get to Times Square in 15 minutes-trust me.
access: You'll have your own private bedroom. You'll be sharing my kitchen which has the shower in it. We have a private toilet in the hall but we don't share it with any other apartments, but it is in the hall.
interaction: I'm friendly, but I'm a working comic so I perform most nights. Come see me perform!
house_rules: Unfortunately my apartment is too small for parties. No pets. Please smoke outside.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a working stand-up comic and writer from Raleigh NC. I've been in NYC for 5 years.

reviews.comments: Kaitlyn was awesome! Ad was completely accurate, and as a host she was extremely courteous, made sure I had everything I needed, and answered every question I had about the city. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a great spot to stay while visiting NYC!

Kaytlin made me feel very welcome and gave a good overview of the area and suggested some great bars and restaurants. Brilliant location right in the middle of the West Village. Always felt very safe in the area. The apartment was extremely keen and although small, the space works well. Recommended!

Loved my stay here! The room was clean, quiet, and cozy, with a really comfortable bed. Kaytlin was a fantastic host—she made me feel so welcome, and had plenty of little conveniences (hair dryer, extra toiletries) to make the stay extra-nice. The neighborhood is also great for access to SoHo, Nolita, LES, East Village, and access to the subway. Highly recommend this cute, bright little place!

Very nice room, the apartment is perfectly situated and Kaytlin was very helpful.
Great !
A very lovely place to stay. Small as described but very clean and well located. Kaytlin is very welcoming and will give you good tips to hang out.
The host canceled this reservation 164 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was my third time using Airbnb for NYC and I've stayed in some pretty good neighborhoods, but Kaytlins place as by far the best when it comes to location. You can walk to Washington Square Park in less than 5 minutes and the subway is just as close, the street she lives on in my favorite in the village. I would 100% recommend staying here, the apartment is a older style NYC apartment which is awesome i think and its only up one fight of stairs.

She was awesome. Really friendly and welcoming. Nothing was too much and even though we were in the same apartment it felt as if we were in separate apartments which made it comfortable. The room was comfortable, a bit small but plenty of room for two people especially cause in this city you don't wanna spend anytime in your apartment but all of it exploring New York. The area was cool, lots of restaurants and bars if you wanna stick close to home. The metro was close and convenient and being near Washington square was nice.
Kaitlyn even out in an AC for us as the weather started to heat up! Awesome!!

A great location, comfortable and quiet. The quirks of the building with the shower in the kitchen and the toilet down the hall, add a bit of historical colour to staying in a New York walk up. Easy to get to from JFK to West 4th and in a terrific neighbourhood. I was out most of the time, only really using the apartment to sleep, which suited the arrangements well. Only briefly crossed paths with Kaytlin, who has her own busy schedule, but that's life in New York and I love it.

Great location, nice restaurants, easy connection to public transport. Kaytin was helpfull. The room is very small, toilet is not in the apartment, so you need to go with the key to the toilet which is nearby in the coridor. It is a private toilet for Kaytlin's apartment. Good aircondition in the room. Very quiet. Room was quite dusty.

Kaytlin's apartment is right in the heart of the west village, yet strangely very quiet (this is a good thing!). Although the apartment is small, I think it is great value for money and you get a real experience of living in NYC... She is a lovely host, although we rarely saw each other due to different schedules. I was travelling on business and needed a place to sleep and get showered, so for me it was perfect.

Kaytlin's place is a classic Manhattan apartment in nice neighbor.  It is perfect place to stay for someone exploring the city.  Kaytlin is respectful, and she is very responsive in term of communication.
Everything is good, we love the location which easy to reach by any transport mode. We did not have chance to meet. And we left the unit for early morning flight

Chambre tres petite mais tres convenable, tres tres bien situee. J'y etais avec mon fils, on etait un peu etroits, Kaytlin etait tres disponibile et aimable, nous a garde les bagages avant notre depart et tout en etant discrete etait toujours presente et tres sympathique et souriante.
Kaytlin was very helpful and knowledgeable. The place was as described - clean and comfortable. Great location!

This place was just as described and I had a great time.  Kaytlin is a fun host and made me feel at home. She regaled  me with stories of her adventurous life .  She bought a reading light especially for me, too, and left fruit in a basket to eat fro breakfast.
This place is the most super location for transportation on both the east and west sides. I'm the one to know, I have lived in NYC in the past for a number of years.

My wife and I loved the Kaytlin apartament it's small but for us is in the best area to stay in NY with a lot of night live and restaurants 
Kaytlin recived us very very well she is so nice

Since our stay, Kaytlin has amended the text of her listing, which previously didn't describe the shower situation. We were surprised to find the bathroom IS the kitchen, and that the toilet is not in the hallway of the apt, but is in the hallway of the building. There is also no door separating the shower/kitchen space with Kaytlin's living space, just a curtain. If you're adventurous and comfortable with that, you'll be fine. But perhaps not the best shared space for those who'd like guaranteed privacy. 

Other than that, the room was clean, and the apartment is in a great location!

Kaytlin was a great host - very sweet and friendly.
My mother and I enjoyed the place and the neighborhood very - it was close to subway and easy to get around, which was important to us.
We saw not so much to Kaytlin, she and we were out most of the time, but we had good communication before and during our stay!
My mother thought the room was a bit too small, but I think it was a PERFECT place to stay, and would come back anytime. Thanks Kaytlin!

We had an amazing time in New York for 5 days.  Kaytlin's apartment was a clean, comfortable, and welcomed oasis to rest our tired feet after trekking across the city every day.  The location in Greenwich Village could not be better.  Convenient access to TONS of great food and bars (I recommend the Vietnamese kitchen downstairs for lunch and then Up & Up for late night cocktails), quick walk to the subway, and an active nightlife.  We even caught sight of a few celebrities exiting the nearby Comedy Cellar while enjoying a slice of pizza on the stoop.  The accommodations were just as described, and Kaytlin's knowledge and recommendations for the city were a helpful starting point.  I would highly suggest this great spot for anyone looking for a great place to nest as your explore NYC.  I just hope that it's still available the next time we're in town! ;)

Awesome time, Great place, very cute and comfy apartment. Felt like a proper New Yorker. 
Kaytlin is very friendly, cool and welcoming. Do go check out her Stand.  
The streets outside are full of things to eat and drink but you can't any noise hear it from inside. 
Check out the Comedy Cellar across the road you may see someone well know (I spotted Louie CK) or Blue Note jazz around the corner. 
TIP Artichoke pizza across the street is also one the best.

Kaytlin was  a warn & welcoming host and helpful about the area which was very centrally located to everything-food, subways, attractions, shopping, lovely park nearby with entertainment.
My husband and I were sharing a small apt with Kaytlin that consisted of a joint kitchen area and we each had our  own bedroom.  It worked out okay as we were rarely home at the same time and when we were she was respectful of our privacy. She knidly responded to my requests for bandaids for my aching feet.  My only concern was the floor was dirty and she responded to cleaning the kitchen floor.    We  wish Kaytlin good luck with her comedy career.

Kaytlin is truly an amazing host and everything went smoothly. From meeting Kaytlin at the apartment, to getting the keys, etc., it was seamless. The room and location were exactly as described and pictured - clean, quiet and cozy. I could not have been in a better part of the city. So many great places for food and drink. I honestly couldn't have a picked a better place. Amazing stay!

Excellent location - food & subway. The place is small (as advertised) which I didn't mind. It was great for my needs as a first time NYC visitor - comfortable bed, fast internet connection (for communicating back home & planning my day) and hot water for the cold weather. Having the bath and toilet separate (the latter is outside the apartment) took some getting used to but not a deal breaker, especially since the toilet is immaculate. Overall, I enjoyed my stay.

This was my first Airbnb experience and I was not sure what to expect. Kaytlin made everything easy from first contact. The space is cozy but perfect for what I needed for my time in NYC. The location is the best - right across from the Comedy Cellar, close to many great restaurants, Bleecker St., and just a couple of blocks from the subway. I always have a great time in the city but this experience made it better than most. Can't wait to come back.

Excellent stay in a very nice place in a lively neighbourhood. Kaytlin has been a welcoming host, discrete and attentionate. The place is particularly quiet (the room is facing a backyard) but is located in a very pleasant nightlife area. The room is clean. All together, this is a very good place to spend a few days in New York !
Very nice trip
We haven't seen Kaytlin very much due to different schedules but she was a very welcoming host! The neighbourhood is perfect and the apt as described. We would stay there again!

Mi estancia chez Kaytlin en el Village fue muy placentera. El departamento está magníficamente ubicado, a cuadra y media del metro y rodeado de buenos lugares para comer y beber, aunque pequeño y exige habilidades para instalarse en él. Pero si lo que se necesita es un lugar seguro para pernoctar en esa parte de la ciudad, es ideal. La regadera no es la más cómoda, pero sirve el propósito. Kaytlin es una muy buena anfitriona. Gracias.
It was a pleasant stay, good public transport connection and the room presented as advertised.

What a great stay! Right in the middle of Greenwich Village with everything in walking distance. Kaytlin is a perfect host she gave us the feeling we were home in her appartement.  We are already making plans to come back!

Kaytlin was a great host. I was looking for a place to stay in NYC to visit and see the sights and we got more than what we asked for with Kaytlin's place. We felt like we lived in NYC. 

First about the place, place was neat and clean and all essential items were available, no problems at all. The building and the apartments were unique, the shower was in the kitchen with a curtain which was really different than what we are used to. So was the restroom which was in the hallway. Don't get me wrong both were perfect and had really hot water too. So no complaints we really loved the different experience. 

Next the neighborhood, absolutely awesome. Full of life and a short 2 minute walk to the subways. I will recommend the artichoke pizza place for late night eats, it is a gem. The Ethiopian restaurant couple of doors down is also worth a mention. Being a vegetarian, we had no problem finding food. 

Overall, an excellent stay and we gladly recommend her place to others. Go live the nyc style life at Kaytlin's place.

The apartment is located right in the thick of Greenwich village on MacDougal Street. Landmarks like Cafe Wha?, IFC center, Comedy Cellar and many others are a stone's throw away. Great people, great music and amazing people all around. The room is quite cozy and comfortable. Being on the second floor (of a building with no elevators) is a big plus as well.

Kaytlin is an amazing host! She is extremely accommodating and had lots of great recommendations for us. She is also a brilliant stand-up comic and you should definitely try to catch one of her shows while you're there.

For a true Greenwich Village experience Kaytlin's place is really hard to beat. Centered right in the heart of it all with amazing night spots all around, there is always something to do. Kaytlin was very friendly and accommodating, gave great recommendations, and the apartment is very clean and comfortable. 5 stars.

Lovely, cute apartment in a great area - perfect for a short stay in NYC. Unfortunately I had to cut visit short due to bad weather in the city but Kaitlyn was incredibly understanding. Would have liked to spend a little longer but maybe next time! Very good experience, communication wouldn't hesitate to book again.

Kaytlin was a great host,  flexible with check out hours and provided awesome recommendations for the area.  The house was very clean but really small so take it into account if you have a large suitcase.

Kaytlin is lovely. She was super flexible with my crazy schedule, helped me with my heavy bags and made me feel comfortable and welcome. The apartament was exactly as told here and the location is the best in Manhattan, in my opinion. Im totally in love with Greenwich Village and its tons of stores/pubs/clubs/restaurants/subway options. I would definitely stay again. :)

Kaytlin is a great host and her place is a gem. 

We didn't see each other much because she was very busy being a busy New York person, but she was very understanding when I messed up the dates of my booking and I had everything I needed. 

The apartment is right in the heart of things. You're metres away from the bars and cafes that Bob Dylan used to play in was back when. 

Would definitely stay there again.

Kaytlin's place is lovely - the location could not be better, her home was quirky and comfy, and Katylin was so nice and accommodating with our check in and check out times. Had an issue with flights and Kaytlin was very kind about it. The place is as pictured, and on the plus the bed is extra comfy. Makes you feel like a New Yorker as it's close to everything and a large subway stop near by too. Would definitely recommend this place and come back again!
We had such a great stay at Kaytlin's. It's an amazing location. Close to bars, amazing food, comedy and the subway. Kaytlin is lovely too. Would definitely stay here again.
Kaitlyn was a wonderful host. My mom and I had a fantasitc time in New York, and Kaitlyn's place was warm, cozy and extremely well situated. We would definitely stay there again!

My "New York" experience was just fantastic and being able to stay at Kaytlin's place was key... Just being able to step out on the street and have it all there within absolute walking distance was incredible. 
New York is a noisy place, and I was totally blown away by how quiet Kaytlin's was, which comes in handy due to the full one nature of Manhattan. If you are up for the "Greenwich Village" experience, look no further than Kaytlin's place. It was clean, straight forward and secure. The few chat I did have with Kaytlin were always friendly and funny. A+++!

A great location amongst plenty of action, places to eat and drink and absorb village lifestyle. Didn't see Kaytljn much but she was friendly and helpful. Loved a open mic music/ comedy show she recommended Monday nights at Cafe Vivaldi. Close to Metro and easy walk to downtown. The room is small and the apartment size meant we did not feel comfortable hanging around even for breakfast. The shower in the kitchen and toilet down the hall were as explained and no real drama short term. All in all a good place for a couple of nights.

What a perfect place to explore New York! Kaytlin was a warm hostess, made us feel very welcome and gave great advice for getting the best out of the neighbourhood. Excellent, cheap places  to eat very close, perfect location for moving around the city by subway. The atmosphere in the area  is so lively and homey! Would definitely stay at Kaytlin's again!

My daughter and I had a fantastic stay in Kaytlins apartment. Truly charming. Fantastic location! Kaytlin let us keep our luggage before check in and after check out. Really saved a lot of hazzle. Thanks so much from Emilie and Anja

This was a very convenient area next to lots of interesting restaurants and the subway.  The accommodations are basic but just right for the price.  Kaytlin was very personable and welcoming.  A very quiet host who made sure I had everything I needed, plus privacy.  This is a good bargain especially for this location and was surprisingly quiet and very restful.

Amazing location and authentic NYC experience.  Kaytlin is a lovely and gracious host....I loved chatting with her and her friends.  Amazing view into the life of a comedian.  I would highly recommend a stay at Kaytlins place!!

I stayed at the apartment for four nights with my boyfriend. Kaytlin was super nice and flexible. The flat was perfectly clean and comfortable and the location was just the best we could have imagined. We would definately recommnd this accomodation and book it again the next time we are in new york. Thanks again:)

La ubicación del departamento es muy buena, el cuarto es silencioso y Kaytlin es muy amable y alegre. Lo pasamos muy bien.
Como comentario, el cuarto es bastante pequeño con poco espacio para el equipaje. La ducha esta en el mismo ambiente de la cocina que se comparte, por lo que hay muy poca privacidad.

I was pleased with my experience. There were no hitches getting into the apartment as  Kaytlin met me on time as promised. Kaytlin was very friendly and helpful. The apartment was as advertised - cozy and bright and clean.  The neighborhood and location is great - lots of activity and restaurants and near the subway and NYU.

Thanks Kaytlin for this moment in your flat. It was very perfect time for me and my mum. I advice this room in the best district of this city. Around it there are all you want to eat, to drink and to make a party. Close of Blue Note Jazz club and many other. If you want a good time in the Village, let's go now!
Genial el apartamento! Genail Katlyn! Mas genial, salir por la puerta y estar en el Village!!!

Great apartment, great location, great holiday.

I chose Kaytlin's apartment for the location and it was excellent. Right in the heart of Greenwich Village, handy for the subway, with lots of eating/entertainment options close by.

The apartment is great, really authentic New York feel and exactly as described. Kaytlin is a great host, and my son and I enjoyed staying with her. We were out and about a lot of the time, and she is pretty busy, so although we didn't see much of each other, it all seemed to work pretty well.

I would recommend Kaytlin's apartment to anyone for an authentic taste of Greenwich Village, and a perfect location to explore New York.

We didn't get to meet Kaytlin, however she was very helpful and responsive. 

The apartment is in a brilliant location - in our opinion, the best in the city! It was clean and looked like the photos.
Great location! Clean, quiet place. Katlyn is also really responsive to any communication.  Definitely would recommend!

Kaytlin's place was charming and surprisingly quiet. There were fresh flowers in the kitchen, too! I chose the location for its proximity to NYU's Bobst Library. Getting there and also to any other place in Manhattan and Brooklyn was very easy, since Kaytlin's apartment is close to the subway. We always got up early and had breakfast in the park. In the evening, the walk to Highline Park is nice, too. We felt safe in the area, which is crazy lively.
I had a great time while I stayed at Kaytlin's place. You will not regret. Great location and everything as I expected.

The place was exactly like described- it was clean, bright and surprisingly QUIET, even though its a very busy area. You could walk everywhere and the subway was only a block away. Super convenient! Kaytlin was very nice and easy to communicate with. The bed was comfy and there was AC, so it was good for hot August days. Highly recommended, I would stay there again!
I think it is the best location in NYC. And Kaytlin was most helpful.

Kaytlins place is located in a great neigbourhood, the perfect place to stay if you want all the good stuff the village has to offer!! Great restaurants, bars if you want that and lots of friendly people. Washington square park is just around the corner, a good place for peoplewatching and to catch som jazz! As for the apartement, just what you see on the pictures. Neat and clean, not so much floorspace in the bedroom, but we unpacked our bags and stowed them away. Worked fine! We had a warm welcome, got all the information we needed and then we had the place to ourselves for 5 days!! Shower is in the kitchen and toilet in the hallway (private!!) and to us this was fun, not strange as you might think.

Rent this place if you want to feel like you live in NYC, we will the next time we come back. For sure!!

For great food just around the corner, (Hidden by Airbnb) : miss Lily's, Caliente cab co (the frozen margerita!) and best if them all Tacombi on Bleecker St! Enjoy!!

We had a pleasant stay. The area is really vibrant, with many bars and restaurants. Ideal starting point to explore the city. We were out the whole time, so we did not spent a lot of time at the apartment. The room itself was what we expected, clean and bright.

Kaytlin's apartment was the perfect fit for our weekend getaway. Settled on a great street with lots of yummy restaurants and plenty of stuff to do. Easy walk to pretty much anywhere. Comfortable bed. Super clean. And surprisingly quiet. Would definitely stay here again. Oh and Kaytlin is great, nice and very helpful with recommending restaurants and stuff to do.
Perfect location and comfortable stay.
Very welcoming host and superb location in the heart of Manhattan.
Kaytlin gave us our space and was there for us when we needed her.

The location is great, lovely neighborhood, close to the subway station and rounded by restaurants and bars. Kaytlin was nice, made efforts to give us privacy and helped us when we needed. Though, you should be aware that the appartment is very small!
Thanks for hosting us.

This cozy apartment is right on the spot, perfect location! Very nice bars and restaurants right outside the building. Famous Cronut store is only a short stroll away. The room is small but cozy and all you need when visiting NYC.
Nice clean place. Friendly host. Bathroom down the hall

Kaytlin is awesome! We had a lot going on the day we arrived in NYC but she was very flexible to meet up with us at a time that was convenient to our schedule. Her place was clean and the location is EXCELLENT!!! One thing to note - the shower is small. It was fine for me, but I could see it being too tight for someone who is over 250lbs. Other than that, everything else was great! I'd stay here again!

A small, but cute, cosy and clean place, extremely well located. The aüartment/room is quiet, although very centrally located.
Kaytlin is a very friendly and helpful host, flexible and responsive.

It's a nice house~My firend and I are very like~
But the bathroom is too small to shower~A little bit problem~
We loved our stay with Kaytlin. She is friendly, welcoming and well informed. The apartment is small as expected but the location great.

Kleines aber sehr nettes Apartment in top Lage!!
Kaytlin hat uns sehr nett empfangen und hatte auch einige Tipps für uns!
Ich würde es wieder buchen!

Small, very nice apartment in the center of Manhattan.
Kaytlin was very friendly! Everything was fine!!!

In general it was okay and Misa who gave me the key was very nice. The room is really small and the shower is in the kitchen.
The apartment is located in a pub area but you can't hear it in the room but you do hear the whole night a very loud air condition.
It is very close to the Washington square park which is great and easily accessible by subway.

Nueva York es espectacular. La ubicación del apartamento es inmejorable ya que se encuentra en grenwis village. La habitación es pequeña y ruidosa sin apenas sitio ni para las maletas. Se encuentra entre dos restaurantes y los estractores suenan muchisimo. En10 días no hemos tenido ningun cambio de sabanas. La ducha esta en la cocina, al lado del fregadero, donde se tiene uno que labar los dientes. Kaytlin como si no estuviera.

Loved my stay at Kaytlin's apartment.  The building oozes charm and the apartment was cozy and quiet - a bijou residence in the heart of the village.  Everything you need is on your doorstep.  I had good communication, Kaytlin was out of town the day I arrived but quickly put me in touch with her friend and arranged for her to be there and show me the ropes.  I had the place to myself during my stay and only met Kaytlin briefly but could tell she is a great host.  I would stay there again in a flash.
Kaytlin was a fantastic host! We had a very comfortable stay

Kaytlin's apartment is very well situated. Plenty of places to eat and drink literally at the doorstep. Only a block from a major subway station that basically gets you anywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn. The bed is very comfortable and private toilet down the hall is perfect for privacy. Kaytlin is cool too. She knows the city gave me some good tips.
Kaitlin was a great host, friendly and communicative.

This was my first time using airbnb and I was not disappointed. Kaytlins place was a great distance to everything so it wasnt hard to get where you wanted to be. When we arrived she was very welcoming and helpful with any questions we had. We definitely plan on coming back and staying with Kaytlin again because of her great hospitality.

Had a great stay at Kaytlin's apartment in the village, small but cozy and super close to everything you could want, great restaurants and bars. Kaytlin was very communicative and friendly. Can recommend!

We had a really nice time at kaytlin's : the place is perfectly located, clean and nice! The room is perfect for a week end! Kaytlin was easy to reach and to communicate. Her friend did the check in for us and suggest nice places to eat! I can not recommend enough this place, and I hope to come back

Kaytlin runs a fantastic spot right in the middle of things. Step on the street and you're looking at a comedy club, a smattering of killer bars and restaurants (including a late-night cookie place), and just the general vibe of the Village. Totally worth it.
Everything as described by Kaytlin. The flat is quite small, but sufficing and quiet since the windows are not faced to the street.

First AirBnb experience was awesome!  The apartment is quite small, but Kaytlin is very welcoming and makes you feel right at home.  I would highly recommend her spot to single travelers and couples who want a home base while exploring all that the Village has to offer.  Great location, host, and space!

I had to leave the place after the half of stay because of a very loud air condition next to the bedroom window and a shower in the kitchen that has no door to Kaytlins bedroom. I knew that the place is small, but for two persons it is too small and the lack of privacy is a problem. No way for longer stays. After I asked about the noise Kaytlin became unfriendly.
Amazing host, outstanding location. Really close to lots of late night good food, music, and comedy, and just one metro line away from Times Square and Broadway. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Kaytlin's place is in the heart of the West Village, on a street full of great places to eat and hang out, and lots of energy. Luckily it's in the back of the building, so while you're in the heart of the action, it's perfectly quiet. Like all apartments in the area, it's compact, but it's very comfortable, and nicely decorated with an individual style, and Kaytlin herself is friendly, welcoming, helpful, but not overbearing. I'd happily stay there again - I felt like a real West Villager!
Such a cute and quite room where you dont have to sacrifice location at all. So much to see and do right on this street. My daughtee and I enjoyed our visit tremendously!

Kaytlin's place is in the heart of Greenwich Village, and for such a busy area, the apartment is very quiet. The bed was comfortable and there is an AC unit in the bedroom to keep things cool. 

Kaytlin was a warm and welcoming host, allowing us to check-in early and leave our bags past check-out. She has some great suggestions for neighborhood eating spots.

Highly recommended as we wouldn't hesitate to stay at Kaytlin's place again!

Kaytlin was a great host and made us feel like home directly. We were provided clean sheets and towels, and had our own little room in her cozy, small apartment. 

She had to leave during the second day so we got the apartment for ourselves, but we managed to arrange with the checkout anyway. 

The apartment is in a great area with walking distance to everything we wanted to see and do. It is perfect for a weekend in New York!

Kaytlin is the best communicator ever! Her place is in a great location for getting to all the right places in the West Village! Very clean and extremely quiet! Will book with her again on my next trip to NYC!
Kaytlins apartment is in the best area and very charming. However it is very small with shower in the kitchen. I didn't meet Kaytlin- and it would have been a bit crowded if she was home.

We loved our 4 night stay in Kaytlin's apartment in Macdougal Street. The apartment is small, but clean, quiet and cozy, and situated in a lively street full of awesome little bars and restaurants. Being located in close proximity to Tribeca, SOHO, Greenwitch, etc; puts you in walking distance of an almost endless variety of shops, bakeries, coffee-shops, bars, restaurants and live entertainment. If you're looking for an authentic NYC experience we highly recommend this place.
Great location!! Easy walking distance to trains and food. Shower is a bit old but clean and well maintained. Kaitlyn was quick to respond to messages. Overall great place to stay :)

It is small with the shower in the kitchen, wc down the hall. That said, it is clean and cozy and in the PERFECT location for the west village. Kaitlyn was a terrific hostess. We walked everywhere and it was just fab. Found all kinds of fun with no real plan. Perfect New York weekend.
Excelente ubicación, cerca del metro y de restaurantes con comida muy rica, lugar seguro, el espacio es reducido pero agradable.

Appartement très bien situé dans une rue très animé . 
À proximité des transports . 
Une super adresse pour visiter New York .
Merci Kaytlin pour ton hospitalité. 
Vivien et Louise
Friendly host, cute & quaint apartment, great location!!
Super friendly and uncomplicated host. Room is cozy and clean. The apartment location can be reached easily and has nice spots nearby. I would gladly return.

The flat is quiet and peaceful in a busy and exciting part of the city. It is small but has everything that you need. The shower is in the kitchen and the toilet is a private one down the hall. We found it all convenient and easy to manage. There is a very comfortable bed. Kaytlin thoughtfully gave us 2 sets of keys which was very useful for coming and going. It is very close to a subway station which was great as well as bars, clubs, cinemas, restaurants and of course Washington Square.

Fantastic location! Right in the heart of Greenwich village, on a very bustling street full of great food and pubs but quiet as the unit doesn't face the street. 3 min walk to thethat subway and Washington square park. Kaytlin wasn't there to check me in but she arranged for her lovely friend to let me in - she gave me lots of tips and was very friendly. Met Kaytlin the next day - really great host and had a few good chats with her. Highly recommend kaytlin's home!

This a funky, charming apartment in a wonderful neighborhood, with great access to public transport. Although the streets were humming (loudly) with activity on the weekend evenings, Kaytlin's place was an oasis of quiet. The best of both worlds. The bed was very comfortable and the place is spotless. Kaytlin is a fantastic host, very accessible and friendly. She suggested several places for us to visit and eat and we loved them! Check-in and check-out were a breeze. I recommend this place very highly and plan to visit again with my teens!
Awesome little place in a cool part of town. A very accommodating host - would highly recommend!

Never got to meet Kaytlin until the night before my check-out after a 10 day stay. Location is fabulous but the apartment does not deliver. It's one notch above camping with a hefty price tag. Didn't worry me that the shower recess was in the kitchen ( that was detailed in the listing), it was the deteriorating state of the shower recess itself which made it feel unclean and mouldy. Also bath mats and hand towels that had not been replaced after previous guest/s, kitchen lino which had not seen a broom or mop in sometime and it was certainly not a 'Bright" space, but it was quiet. 
The gas smell in the 'private toilet' in the hallway is unbearable (and am unsure why no-one has mentioned it before in reviews as its pervasive in that space) so if you have already booked ask to use the toilet next to it. It has no key and no gas smell. Clearly all the other residents use it so I am not sure why Airbnb guests can't? Why do we have to put up with the smelly (and who knows, maybe dangerous) toilet space? Loved New York. Loved Greenwich Village. What a shame I can't say I loved this space.
The apartment is exactly as described, in a great location, with a lovely hostess. Very much recommended
Had a great stay at Kaytlin's flat or rather in the surrounding very vivid neighbourhood that we enjoyed a lot, thx Kaytlin!
Kaytlin's appartement is very well located in the heart of Greenwitch Village. She is easy to communicate with, really available and always here to help. We had a great stay there. Thanks !

c'est très bien placé, le quartier agréable et très vivant,la propriétaire des lieux sympathique et discrète.
Cependant c'est un problème de cohabiter dans un logement ou la douche et l’évier(lavabo) sont dans la cuisine.
un manque de place dans la chambre pour ranger ses affaires sans empiéter sur la cuisine
pour la partie salle de bain dans la cuisine cela ressemble à du camping mal entretenu.
c'est ok pour les jeunes .
Clean, well maintained apartment in a centrally located neighborhood. Hostess is attentive and easy to talk to.
Great host, great location, and a comfortable stay.
Wonderful place to stay and see all of NYC's attractions
Great host and had a wonderful stay
Kaytlin's flat is in a great spot, perfect for Greenwich and very near the subway and great places to eat and drink.

An amazing location that made us feel like we right amongst the hustle and bustle off NYC that make us all fall in love the with city. Kaitlyn was great didn't see her a lot but was so easy to contact to answer any questions we had.

Kaytlin's place is insanely convenient for most things to do in the New York area. There are a million things to do and eat in the area and plenty of chances to have fun. My best bnb experience to date
Location location location!! Great value for the most convenient location in Greenwich Village. So easy to get around with immediate access to tons of cafes, restaurants, & shops
Kaitlyn was a great and accommodating host. Her apartment is well located, accurately described, and the bed is super comfy.

I had a great stay at Kaytlin's place. The location is very easy to get to and has lots of great restaurants in the area. Despite the bustling neighborhood, the room is protected from the street and very quiet. The room doesn't have a lot of space outside of the bed, but it's nice, and the bed itself is very comfortable. Kaytlin and her friend Mari, who was staying in the room while Kaytlin was away, were both very friendly and accommodating. Highly recommended for light travelers who want to stay in a lively part of the city.
Kaitlyn was a great host. Communication was clear and prompt. Listing was accurately described. Convenient location. Very walkable and easy access to the subway.
Kaytlin is a very nice host. There is clean room vith good location. It was pleasant to stay in this room.

Everything you need for a great stay in NYC. The clean and quiet apartment is a great base to explore the city as it's just a block away from a metro station. The apartments surrounding area is a fun lively spot with so much literally at the doorstep. Highly recommend.
I didn't see kaytlin much but when I did she was friendly and helpful. Location was great!!

We loved our stay at Kaytlin's place! It was very central, close to the subway station and shops/restaurants, and is in a great neighbourhood. Kaytlin's place is so cute and cozy. We felt like we had a real New York experience! We would absolutely recommend staying here :) Thank you again, Kaytlin!
Excellent location, near from metro, at the street many places that opens night  and great festivity mood. Excellent place to rest.
Kaytlin's apartment is in a fantastic location, we couldn't have asked for a better spot! She was very easily contactable by email. Would stay here again
We loved the neighborhood and the charm of the old building.
Perfect place to eat, drink and be merry. Stay here and you will not only enjoy every second, you’ll probably be 10 pounds heavier from all the amazing eats on Macdougal.
Great location, quiet and cosy room.  Perfect spot.

We had a wonderful 4 night stay at Kaytlin's place. It is very cozy, but the location cannot be beat. Incredible restaurants all around, yet a quiet and clean bedroom just steps away. We would definitely stay again.

I really enjoyed to stay in Kaytlin's place. The location was very convenient close to the subway station and full of multiple delicious food options. Also I loved the charm of her apartment. Kaytlin was very nice, helpful and replied promptly.
Nice apartment in the heart of where you want to be in Manhattan!
A great location. Fast and helpful communication. The Comedy Cellar was great. Food in Saigon Shack was amazing. On the flip side the bedroom is small.
Loved the stay and the location is excellent! The West Village is an ideal place to stay! Will come back and stay again next year!
Kaytlin's place is a quiet oasis in a lively part of NYC.
Nice neighboorhood and location. Convenient for couples. Nice decoration.

Apartment was nice, quiet, and in a great location of New York. If you want to experience some comedy shows and the everyday hustle and bustle of New York this is the perfect spot. It’s about two miles north of Battery Park so if you are wanting to do some of the touristy stuff (Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, World Trade Center) it’s not terribly far. Kaytlin made sure that all of my needs were met and I had no issues. It was the perfect experience of New York.
Had a wonderful stay! Such a great location for restaurants and night life. Thanks Kaytlin!

If you want to feel like a local and be in an unbeatable proximity to the best NY has to offer - choose this spot!  Kaytlin’s place is pure NYC and is so so so close to everything we wanted to do.  The building itself has so much character and the spots around it were great.  She is also very fast at responding to questions, gave great tips and was super accommodating to our needs.  Definitely will return whenever we're in the city! Thanks so much, Kaytlin!
This place is literally in the middle of the action of Greenwich Village. I literally had to push past a foody tour group on the doorstep, that’s how great the spot is . Apartment is absolute NY chic

Kaytlin is a fantastic host!

The location was perfect for me - lots of delicious food and ice cream and coffee options just a few steps from the door. 

I Ce NY (ice cream) is super yum imo (banana). 

The apartment itself is cozy, cute and clean. Easy to recommend.

Fabulous location - truly perfect. We enjoyed so many wonderful meals, a comedy show...stay here to feel like you really live in NYC! Kaytlin is such a charming and interesting person, and a welcoming host. We enjoyed chatting with her!

The apartment is very close to NYU and there are lots of nice bars and the Washington Square close by. Nevertheless, the apartment is very quite and also very cozy. It is small, though, and the shower is in the kitchen and the toilet outside of the apartment (but not shared). Kaitlyn is kind and easy going, has nice tipps to do.
Adorable place and very nice host!
Charming apartment, host and neighbourghhood ;)
Finding a quiet place in this area was my biggest concern and Kaytlin's place was just that. The bed was comfy and Kaytlin was very flexible and communicative.
Kaytlin's place is really cozy, peaceful and convenient! 2 min walk from NYU, the subway station! I'd love to live there again!

Tiny, quirky, tidy apartment in a funky area with great access to public transport. We had absolutely everything we needed and the location gave us a more ‘local’ experience than if we had stayed in more touristy areas uptown.

We enjoyed being so close to the subway with easy access to all of NYC. We enjoyed several of the great restaurants nearby, many within 1 block. The apartment was cute and cozy, just as described and pictured. The bathroom, although in the hall, felt very private and worked out well. The building was quiet. Kaytlin was helpful and the communication was great. Thanks!

Kaytlin's place was perfect for my 12 year old daughter and myself. The space was clean and very quiet. The quiet surprised us because we were in the heart of Macdougal Street. It is a unique space, that made us feel like we had the 'what it's like to actually live in the Village' experience, and it was bright, and clean. The private toilet was down the hall and was accessed by key, but that added to the uniqueness of the experience, and was ideal.  It was an easy walk to the subway as well as Washington Square Park.  And it was just upstairs from Insomnia cookies, and the historic and quaint Cafe Reggio.  We would stay there in a heartbeat again.  It was nice to be in the center of a neighborhood, in a lived in space, rather than a hotel.

Kaytlin is an amazing host!  She is extremely friendly, accommodating and goes above and beyond to make sure you have the best time you can have!  

The place itself is situated in one of the best places in town!   We would definitely stay here again.

A lovely small room in a lovely apartment. Very quiet even though in a very vivid neighbourhood (apt. going to the inner courtyard) great NY-ceiling! (rarely to find at private places!) lot of original charm! Nice kitchen with very nice Details! perfect communication!
Tolle Lage, freundliche Gastgeber, gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis, ein bisschen wenig Stauraum. :)

Loved staying at Kaytlin's!  The location is amazing and Kaytlin was kind, incredibly accommodating, and responsive.  I love the character of the building - shower in the kitchen, toilet in the public hallway.  And while the apt is on the smaller side, the bed was comfortable and I spent all of my time out and about in the neighborhood.  Would definitely recommend and would stay here again myself :)

Das ist eine super charmante Wohnung im Herzen Manhattans.
Vor der Tür tobt das Leben und drinnen hat man es ganz ruhig und privat.
Kaytlin war die Zeit über garnicht anwesend, aber immer gut erreichbar, wenn ich Fragen hatte. Sie war unkompliziert und flexibel, was check inund out betraf. Schönes Minizimmer mit gutem Bett. Ich würde wieder bei ihr buchen.

Kaytlin's place is in a great neighborhood and very conveniently located to public transportation. I absolutely loved walking around to shop, eat, explore, and enjoy the nightlife, and her apartment was perfect for coming home to sleep after a day of exploration. I had a very comfortable stay.
A very nice quiet location right within the heart of the west village. Very clean and well maintained. There were many charming vintage touches of the apartment.

If you are looking for a quiet place in one of the "hippest" parts of town, this is the one - a cute little apartment loaded with New York City quirks, history and character.  The location couldn't be better - you have everything at your fingertips and can easily get anywhere you need to go.  Communication with Kaytlin was excellent every step of the way, which I really appreciated, and check in was a breeze.  Overall, we had a marvelous stay -  Thanks, Kaytlin!

Oase van rust in een zeer levendige en gezellige omgeving. Excellente plek. Je hebt het gevoel in een studentenhuis te zitten, maar dat hoort daar ook zo. Alles is schoon en de ontvangst en vertrekregeling waren prima. WC op de gang is een minpuntje en ook de douche in de keuken is niet het toppunt van luxe. De airco buiten maakt wel een hoop herrie tot 2.30 uur 's nachts. De kamer is klein maar volstaat. Ik heb er prima nachten doorgebracht en overdag heb je in New York wel wat anders te doen dan in je bed te liggen.
Amazing Place & People!  Highly Reccomend :D
Really great location for Greenwich village/NYU and adorable little apartment. Quiet room with good ac window unit. Great value for the area. My mom and I really enjoyed our stay.
Great spot with a great host. The neighborhood is full of fun places and close to the subway. Very easy to get around. Kaytlin is awesome and very helpful. 10/10 would stay here again.

Apartment is smack dab in the middle of everything you would want to do in Greenwich Village. Very small but that is to be expected in Greenwich Village.
Apartment was very clean and Kaytlin and Trey were very nice. We enjoyed our stay

The location of Kaytlin’s place is amazing, close to shops and some fantastic little eateries. Its very cute, and although small, its not a bother if you plan on spending most your time strolling around the city. We really enjoyed staying at her place. We enjoyed every moment. For the fit folk we highly recommend making use of citi bike to get around in manhattan, as its faster that by bus or car and a nice way to explore.

Charming, incredible location (truly everything is walking distance!), surprising privacy in a cozy space, classic NYC experience. Kaytlin goes above and beyond, is responsive, and has excellent tips to maximize any visit. She clearly loves her neighborhood & her apartment, and it shows in little details; a basket of luxe travel sized toiletry goodies to choose from, inspirationally chic decor, satiny soft bedding, temp controlled room, inviting & intentional spaces, a guest book to sign...I could go on! I felt like I was staying with a favorite cousin who genuinely wished me the best time and would be there if I needed anything. Don’t think twice - book with Kaytlin and enjoy!

We stayed for couple days at Kaytlins place.  If you love the studenthome-feel-like (little dirty, small and some weet smells) than it's the perfect spot to be. The location is really great, with good places to eat and drink and central in Manhatten.
It was a great experience with Kaytlin’s hospitality and convenient location.
Great location! Old building adds to character of neighbourhood. Be prepared for shared accommodations. Shower in kitchen is new one for us.

Great location!!!!
Cute & quirky, I wish the walls could talk there would be so much to say. Amazing little spot, walking distance to Joe’s Pizza & Porto RICO Importing Co. for best iced coffee in the city. Loved loved loved NYC
Amazing location!

I cannot imagine a better place to have land for our two-week stay in New York City. Amazing location, wonderful older building, and the best host possible! Kaitlyn made our stay so very memorable. Highly recommend!
Perfekt lägenhet i ett skönt område, Kaytlin var behjälplig när det behövdes. Skulle absolut kunna tänkt mig att bo här igen.

Kaytlin’s apartment is perfect is authentic New York City living! It was like a little dream come true. It is very clean and quaint. You can’t beat the location! On a busy Village street with so much going on yet inside is quiet and relaxing.

Et lille værelse i West Village nær et pulserende byliv. Tæt på subway og butikker i SOHO. Værelset er småt og man skal kunne acceptere bad i køkken og toilet på gangen. 
Kaytlin var en fantastisk sød vært og vi fik lov at stille vores bagage til vi skulle ud til lufthavnen.
A great location to launch a trip to New York! The description was accurate, though the room was slightly smaller than expected. Kaytlin is very friendly and helpful.
Location! Location! Location! The street bustling with people, restaurants and bars  but  quiet in the apartment. The location was perfect for us to walk to Chelsea, Soho, Little Italy and Tribeca.
Cool tiny spot in a cool area. All you need is just there.
The place was great! Location was really central and easy to reach. The room is cosy and clean, only the shower curtain is a little dirty. Everything else was really nice and the perfect stay for us!

Excellent location with plenty of amazing restaurants nearby. Room does not have any walking space and barely any room if you have a big luggage. Shower is located in the kitchen which could be quite cramped if you’re a large person. Overall a very pleasant New York experience.

Appartment at the best spot in NYC. Host is very friendly and helpfull! Not the biggest appartment but a very good bed. The toilet (private) in the hallway is not a problem at all. Outside the appartment, lovely bars, restaurants, comedy cellar etc. I come back when I am again in NYC.
Delightful space in the heart of the city! Perfection if your just looking for a place to lay your head.
Wonderful little apartment in a fantastic location!

Of all my trips to NYC, I've always wanted to stay in the Village, and this was such a cool spot! Kaytlin was a lot of fun and was super accommodating for our late arrival, even suggesting the best spot for pizza right around the corner (Fiore's), which totally hit the spot and probably IS the best pizza I've had stateside! The space is not going to be for everyone -- as in the description, the shower is in the kitchen and the bathroom is shared. But it was perfect for my husband and I for 3 nights! The bedroom is very small so we kept our luggage in the kitchen.  It was fine for us but a more discerning traveler might have a problem with it. It is in a LIVELY neighborhood -- so much cool stuff close by! Also very close to subway so it's easy to get around. Being in such a lively neighborhood though, the apartment itself is super quiet. We loved it and would stay here again!
The place is small, but it has about the best location in town, if you like the Village, and I do.

Terrific host, awesome location and her place has a really unique charm to it. 

Lots of places to eat/drink as soon as you step out the door.
GREAT location for exploring the West Village. Small, unique space that Kaytlin has done a great job making feel cozy and inviting.
I really enjoyed the location. The street is  busy at night , that is something that I appreciate, but the apartment is very quiet , witch is very good also .

Tiny, but perfect for what we needed. She was so sweet and it was in a great location. Close to a lot of restaurants and the building was quiet & safe. The only downside to the stay was after 11pm the building door locked, and the key we were given did not work the entire time. So we had to wait until someone happened to be going inside to get in. Other than that, Kaitlyn was a great host :)

Had such a great time, the location is great, and while the appartment is quite small, with a shower in the kitchen, it did not bother me that much. Kaytlin was such a helpful and friendly hostess. I did not see her that much, so it was like having the appartment to myself.

Kaytlin was a great host, kind, organized and sweet .  Her apartment was lovely - warm, quiet, and cozy.  Everything you see here is exactly as you will get (and more) if you decide to stay here.  I didn't get to see her because she was really busy during my stay and so was I, but all communication was great - Kaytlin is a "people person" and staying at her place is definitely better than going to a hotel as she was particularly good at interacting with me during my stay and making me feel comfortable (and the price too, awesome for NYC).   I recommend her and her home.  I would stay there again.

Very well located. 
Kaytlin is very nice, and helpful. We had a wonderful time.
Easily the best location for a NYC holiday. The place is a real old school New York apartment. But really comfortable. if you're a comedy fan than this is a must
Great location, so glad we stayed here. Perfect if you want to experience living in NYC.

Amazing location and very unique, historical "Old New York" place. Definitely on the smaller side but perfectly comfortable and super clean. Check-in was a breeze, Kaytlin very nice and helpful. Zero complaints, would definitely go back.

The neighborhood is perfect for a walkable central location in the West Village. The guest room space is tight but ideal for a solo traveler. Kaytlin was very responsive with any questions so know you are in good hands.

name: 2 bedr apart 5 mins from Airport
space: My apartment is on the 12th floor of  the 15 story building.  The apartment is next to the metro and metro-bus stations. It is only 3 stops to the International Ataturk Airport and 2 stops to the CNR Trade and Conventional Center. You will have the comfort of house living with all necessary appliances such as refrigerator, laundry, stove/oven, air-conditioners on both living room and one of the bedrooms, Cable TV and wireless internet and so. Central heating and 24 hour hot water. The apartment is in the nice and secure living area, having security with camera surveillance,  free parking, nice restaurants beside global fast-food restaurants, chance of shopping at mall or nearby bazaar. Two elevators. Generator(ups) automatically turns on in case of city electric failure. Free parking. Laminated wooden floor all rooms. Kitchen, bathroom  and entrance has ceramic tile floor. 3 nearby shopping malls beside city's authentic bazaars.

host.host_about:
I live in Istanbul. Atakoy region is only 5 minutes away from Ataturk International Airport.
I am a Volunteer Fireman and a leader of a search and rescue team. 
I am also a member of a Mountain hiking and Trekking group. I love to travel the near region mountains and valleys.
Listening music, reading books, nature and wild life I love to watch.
I am a definite non smoker and do not drink alcoholic beverages. I love doing daily sports, gym trainings.

reviews.comments: Je remercie Mehmet pour son chaleureux accueil, il a etait tres réactif car nous étions vraiment embêter et dans le besoin d'un logement. À notre grande surprise l'appartement est dans un etat irréprochable, du haut standing. Mehmet a etait tres a l'écoute pendant notre séjour, toujours disponible et disposé à répondre à nos questions. Je recommande cet appartement de plus il est situé à seulement 5 min de l'aéroport ataturk donc parfait. Merci beaucoup Mehmet Emin

Mehmet is a great communicator. He really helped us out finding his place when another host fell through. He was there ready to meet us when we arrived and gave us all the information needed so we were settled. He was there if we needed in hi and sent a few sms' to make sure everything was ok.

The apartment is spacious and clean with some good views. It is right next to the metro, metrobus and a small shopping mall. Despite the busy surroundings it is a quiet apartment and was a nice place to come back to and relax in in the evenings.
A nice place to stay with complete facilities. Easy access through metro.

name: Koza Park New Luxury Apartment With Balcony.
summary: The apartment is brand new, super clean, with beautiful lightings, a 55 inch tv and cable.
space: The apartment is located on the 5th Floor of the apartment complex,in the nearby center of Bahcesehir where there is Akbati mall, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is close to the Koza world of sport tennis where the Istanbul open is played.
description: The apartment is brand new, super clean, with beautiful lightings, a 55 inch tv and cable. The apartment is located on the 5th Floor of the apartment complex,in the nearby center of Bahcesehir where there is Akbati mall, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is close to the Koza world of sport tennis where the Istanbul open is played. Lake and walking area. For questions I can be reached by phone or email. I will be most happy to help you in anyway I can. Akbati mall, The club gym center, Koza world of sports, lots of bars and restaurants. They are car rentals close by, easy access to Taxi’s and walk able distance to the mall.

house_rules: Smoking isn’t allowed inside the apartment, you can only smoke in the balcony.

name: Oportments - Oliveiras
summary: A unidade é constituída por 2 quartos, 1 sala de estar com sofá cama, 1 cozinha com área de refeições e uma casa de banho privativa dividida em duas partes (chuveiro e quarto de banho). Para além disso os apartamentos estão ainda equipados com ar condicionado e com acesso a WI-FI gratuito. Desfrute do melhor que a localização destes apartamentos lhe pode dar. Oportments

reviews.comments: Nos ha encantado el apartamento, muy bonito y acogedor y lo mas importante, céntrico, sin necesidad de coger el transporte publico. El dueño muy amable y da respuestas rapidas.

name: Click! Apartment by JC
summary: Localizado numa rua do coração da cidade, o Click! Apartment encontra-se a 8 minutos a pé da estação de metro Trindade e próximo de todas as comodidades de que possa precisar na sua estadia, tal como restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia, lavandaria e monumentos. Extremamente luminosa, a habitação conta com uma decoração moderna onde o espaço e o conforto se enquadram na perfeição!

reviews.comments: Sempre me hospedo em espaços da airbnb, mas sem dúvida, esse foi o apartamento que mais me surpreendeu positivamente! O lugar consegue ser ainda melhor que as fotos, um bom gosto em cada detalhe, a localização é incrível, conseguimos fazer tudo caminhando, os anfitriões são absurdamente simpáticos e solícitos além do apartamento ser muito limpo e novinho! Super indico e sempre q voltar a Porto é aqui que me hospedarei!

A casa é fantástica, cheia de estilo e super bem localizada. É possível conhecer a zona antiga da cidade toda a pé, até à ribeira.
A casa foi perfeita para nós, somos 2 adultos e 3 crianças. Tem tudo o que é preciso para uns dias perfeitos.
O João é super prestável e foi 5 estrelas em tudo o que precisamos.
Sem duvida uma excelente opção para uns dias no Porto.

summary: Great New Property To Our Rentals! Hawaii 14.417% Tax Included in the Nightly Rates -Enjoy this charming Hawaiian Plantation Style cottage just a short walk to beautiful Kahekili Beach Park also known as Airport Beach. Lush landscapes and Plumeria trees bursting with flowers. Kahekili is known for its expansive sand beach, great reef snorkeling and diving, or just spend the day sun bathing and watching the boats cruise by!
space: -Lush tropical landscapes line the property and provide a gorgeous Hawaiian Plantation setting on 10 Acres with 40 cottage units. -Located directly across the street from one of West Maui's best beaches, Kahekili also known as(Airport Beach).  -Set back steps from the beach and also just a short walk away from the cottage is Castaways Restaurant and Bar. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served at Castaway's along with an outdoor bar for happy hour while you watch the ocean and sunsets! -Two swimming pools. -We have installed portable AC units in the bedrooms for comfortable night sleeping! This area of the island is really quite cool in the winter months at night and trade wind breezes keep the days pleasant as well. -High vaulted ceilings with open beams give a very spacious feel to the cottage. -Gas BBQ grill for meals out on the large outdoor lanai! -Please note there is some noise from the road but this is much less in the the evenings.

It is also directly across the street from the Westin kaanapali Ocean Resort which hosts a handful of great dining spots like Pulehu Italian Grill.  You can walk to the beach in about 3-5 minutes and once on the beach you can walk all the way down to Black Rock and famous Kaanapali Beach for snorkeling, activities, shopping and dining. It is a bit of a walk all the way down though, so driving may be better and you can drive to Kaanapali Beach in about 5 nimutes.

host.host_about: Realestate Manager

reviews.comments: My friends and I had a wonderful stay.  The cottage was clean and came with all the necessary amenities.  We used the 4 beach chairs nearly everyday.  The pool was clean and well kept. Location is ideal, near many restaurants and beaches.  Our reason for 4 stars instead of 5 was simply because the WiFi didn’t work (host informed us ahead of time and provided a gift for our inconvenience), and the air conditioner had some issues.  Overall, a fabulous little place and we had a wonderful time.

We will stay here again when we come back to Maui:)  The cottage was perfect and had everything we needed. The pool was great with only us at it most of the time when we used it. The other pool was closed for repairs. The actual grounds are quiet. The location was perfect in terms of beach locations, especially the 5 minute walk across the road Kahekili Beach Park. Downtown Lahaina was only a 15 minute drive. The only downside is the traffic noise from Honoapiilani hwy in the evening BUT we would still come back because that did not ruin are stay when it is 80 and sunny every day with beautiful evenings with trade winds. Mahalo
Nice house, good space and good location. The only problem is that the house is close to the road and during the night we can hear some noise from the cars. Anyway, I recommend this place.

name: Contemporary apartment in Kennedy Town
summary: Welcome to our apartment! A recently refurbished, bright and modern apartment with wall to wall windows providing natural light and mountain views. Our homely apartment is located on the sea front in Kennedy Town close to shops, popular bars and trendy restaurants with easy access to local transport: MTR (4 stops / 8 minutes into Central), taxi ranks, trams and bus stops. You will have our entire apartment to enjoy and relax while you explore Hong Kong.
space: Mountain views, hardwood flooring, contemporary decor, furniture and natural light will immediately make you feel at home. Our lounge and dining area provides a comfortable space for you to relax (TV, Wifi and Netflix available at your leisure) suitable space for working or enjoying a tasty meal from the local eateries. A fully furnished kitchen with 2 gas hobs, fridge/freezer, washing machine, pots, pans, kitchenware are available for use to enjoy a home cooked meal. The bedroom provides a cosy sleeping space with black-out curtains and air-conditioning to ensure a good nights sleep.

neighborhood_overview: Kennedy Town (K-Town) is a newly gentrified suburb on the western side of Hong Kong Island - right along the sea, a calm escape and a foodies dream offering a diverse range of cuisines. A charming mix of old and new…  Local on the harbour front; Kennedy Town provides a welcome break from the hustle and bustle of the city. Excellent transport links across Hong Kong and less then 10 minutes from the ferry terminal. Easily accessible from the airport with the express train into Central and less then an 8 min taxi or MTR ride away.
notes: Taxi rank on the corner of our street (10 metres away) Tram and bus stops are on the street behind the building  MTR is a 5 minute walk - hop on the Island line and only 4 stops / 8 minutes into Central 10 minutes to the ferry terminal to explore many of the nearby islands or Macau. Feel like going for a hike or run? Start the hike up to Victoria Peak straight from our apartment or run/stroll along the pier for a secluded water front experience; a great place to watch the sunset.
transit: Transportation links: Taxi rank on the corner of our street (10 metres away) Tram and bus stops are on the street behind the building  MTR is a 5 minute walk - hop on the Island line and only 4 stops / 8 minutes into Central 10 minutes to the ferry terminal to explore any of the nearby islands or Macau.
access: The apartment is very secure benefitting from 24hour security guards at the entrance, lift access, a key code to access the floor and key to enter the flat.
interaction: Available 24/7 via (Hidden by Airbnb) or email and we will have a friend who lives nearby to meet and greet on your arrival, to show you our apartment and answer any questions you may have.
house_rules: This is our home. We kindly ask that you treat our place with respect as you would your own: Please take off shoes in the apartment.  Keep noise to a minimum after 10pm and respect the neighbours. No smoking inside the home please. Extra cleaning fees to remove odour and stains may be applied. Please wash your dishes after use and clean up after yourselves. This is our home so you may find food/consumables in the fridge or the cupboard – we would recommend that if you do feel so inclined to eat/drink you replace where necessary.  Please do not rearrange our furniture - we like it how it is!  No parties or events. Please (please) no illegal activity. Lastly, because this is an Airbnb community not a hotel, and is also our home, please be respectful of the property and keep it clean before you leave. (Respect our property and our things please!).
