neighborhood_overview: Redfern is rated one of the top ten places to live in Sydney. Redfern is a dynamic community that is home to one of the largest Indigenous populations, political and cultural activists, artists, trailblazers and leaders. Redfern is steeped in Indigenous history. Redfern has always been an important cultural place for Indigenous peoples. Redfern has something for everyone  - it has award winning restuarants, hipster cafes, and is surrounded by parks. Redfern is also a short walk to Surry Hills which has some of the best food in Sydney.
transit: Redfern has it's own train station and has numerous bus routes all around sydney. Redfern has off the street parking. The location is perfect right in the centre and close to beaches and the airport. You can even walk to Central Station which can connect you with the rest of NSW and Australia.
interaction: I’m a local of the area and I’m happy to answer any questions you have about Sydney and/or the history of Redfern.

host.host_about: Hello, I believe that travelling allows you to find your best self. When I was 19 I went overseas for the first time for four months and the experience provided me with the courage to follow my dreams - two degrees later and 20 years of working experience I set off on a gap year. This experience helped me find the courage to start my own unpaid project.  In that year I stayed mostly in air bnb and it allowed me to experience the culture of the place first hand. Now I'm opening up my own studio.  I hope people get to love Redfern and Sydney as much as me :)

reviews.comments: This place was adorable, with lovely details and personal touches - just perfect for my needs. The area had a great vibe, and the location so close to cafes and transport, made getting around and eating out so easy. I will definitely stay again, perhaps a week next time, as it was also very affordable.

A perfect studio in the 'heart' of Sydney. Great host,tastefully furnished,neat & tidy,top location  and about a third of the price of comparable hotel accomodation. Thoroughly recommended, and can't wait to return.
Absolutely amazing. It was my first time using Airbnb and Cathy made it a wonderful experience. The place was so fresh and tidy. Will definitely stay there again.

We had a lovely stay at Cathy’s place. It was clean, cosy and a great location. 
Cathy was very warm and friendly and the whole process was very smooth and easy.  Would definitely recommend!
Thank you Cathy :)

This is a neat little studio unit, tucked away off one of the narrow by lanes in Redfern.  Easy walk to the train station, shops, and amenities.  Cathy was a wonderful host, and met me in person during check-in. I found everything as described in the posting.  The unit is thoughtfully done up with nice personal touches to make one feel at home.  I’d highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sydney and looking for a cozy place to stay for one or two people.
Excellent stay, comfortable & cosy

Our stay at Cathy’s was good. It had a cool vibe, for the space available, Cathy has made it look great with some cool artwork, books layed out in a funky way on the shelf, wooden features etc. Bed was comfy, shower was good (doesn’t just dribble water) and it’s in a good location. Just around the corner from redfern station, which makes getting into the city centre super easy. The nearby surrounding area is alright, few shops and bars nearby. Cathy is very attentative, too. She replies to your messages as quick as you would reply to a text. So if you need anything, you’ll get an answer pretty quick.

João's flat is amazing!
Super stylish and very well located (subway in 5min walking distance and pretty easy to get around even by foot). 
He met us for check in and explained everything we needed to know about the apartment - he even brought us some snacks :)
Internet works great, you have an awesome terrace and across the street there's a shopping mall with supermarket and well known stores for all kinds of shopping. Also, there are a few restaurants near by in case you want to grab a bite.
I would absolutely recommend this accommodation and stay here again when going back to Porto.  
Thank you João, for making our stay so comfortable.

Não poderia deixar de referir, não menos importante, a hospitalidade e simpatia do João, o sorriso com que fomos recebidos, a sua amabilidade e disponibilidade, mesmo num fim de semana tão especial para todos . Tivemos ainda direito aos mimos que nos deixou em casa para o pequeno almoço ou em caso de a fome apertar. Indicada pelo João fomos ainda tomar um excelente pequeno almoço, a bom preço na fantástica Pastelaria Celeste ao lado do apartamento. Na qual também tem oportunidade de comprar pão. Recomendo de todo este espaço a quem pensar ir visitar o Porto. 5⭐

host.host_about: Nice and happy guy. Love to travel, cook, eat and doing sports.

reviews.comments:
Tessa (amiga de Guilherme) nos trato muy bien y nos informo de todas las cosas de la casa, así como de los lugares donde comer y visitar en el  vecindario y ciudad.
Estuvimos hospedados durante la primera semana del mundial 2014, y aunque no pasamos mucho tiempo en el apartamento la estancia estuvo bien.
El vecindario esta bastante bien, tiene un centro comercial debajo,  la estación de metro cerca, y la playa de copacabana a unos 800 mts.

We loved this apartment.  It is very convenient, directly above a shopping mall that has a supermarket, an ATM/bank, numerous small juice stands and pastry shops, and a drug store.  It is located within a 1 minute walk to the Siquiera Campos metro station and about 10 minutes to the beach.  The apartment feels very safe because there is a police station right next door to the shopping center, though we would still recommend not walking and only taking taxis after around 9:00-10:00 p.m.  It was perfect for Reveillon (New Year's Eve), because we were able to grab some champagne at one of the stores downstairs, and then walk down to the Copacabana Beach.

The neighborhood is also really lovely.  There is a large playground for children within a 3 minute walk and the whole neighborhood feels very green and family friendly.  On Wednesdays, there is a fruit and vegetable market in that same park area.  We preferred staying back a little, away from the main busy stretch on Avenida Atlantica.  

The apartment itself is large and very comfortable.  The main room has a side view of Christ the Redeemer, two comfortable couches, and a dining area.  The kitchen is small but perfect for making small meals, like breakfasts and lunch, and there is also a washing machine and drying rack that works great.  The bathroom has a deep bathtub which is a very unusual find in Brazil.  The bedroom was large enough for the bed plus we were able to keep our daughter's crib in the other side of the room.  The air conditioning works great in both of the rooms and the bedroom stays very dark because there are metal retractable shades.  The Internet was fast and reliable and we were even able to stream videos, which was a surprise since Internet can often be slow in South America.

It does get noisy at night, but we have a white noise machine that we use for our daughter whenever she is sleeping and that blocked out all of the exterior noise.  Also, our one recommendation for Guilherme and Tessa is to put window shades/curtains in front of the living room's windows because it gets very hot in the middle of the day in that room and the exterior lights would make it difficult to sleep at night in the living room.  Until they put in shades/curtains, I don't think the living room would be that comfortable to sleep in.

But, that's a minor point.  We would have loved to stay here much longer, especially since it is such a great value!  My brother and sister-in-law were staying at the Marriott for $375/night and their whole room was about 1/3 of the size of this fantastic apartment.  I particularly recommend this apartment for families but, no matter what your situation is, you won't regret booking here.  It's a great spot!

Excelente!  Desde el primer día Guilherme  estuvo completamente a disposición nuestra para que nuestra estadía fuera excelente, es mas, incluso un día a las 23hs tuvimos un inconveniente con la cerradura y a los 10 min de notificado se hizo presente en el departamento y soluciono nuestro problema.  La ubicación del departamento es inmejorable, a 1 cuadra del metro y con varios bares y restaurantes.

Two stations to Central. Four stations to Hung Hum(PolyU), 15mins walking to Mongkok . Tai Kok Tsui is an area west of Mong Kok in Kowloon, Hong Kong. Blocks of high-rise residential buildings have been erected on the reclaimed area to the west, which marked the revitalization of the area with many restaurants and bars setting up shop. Many of the older residential buildings have been vacated and are set to be replaced by luxury high-rise buildings. * This is shared studio. I will live with you together. Items include amenities: Double sofa bed(1.2m*2m) *as standard HK size, this sofa bed is quite comfortable for one person. But it is also suited for two slim people. Pls considering it before booking Bed sh

reviews.comments: Shirley is vey nice and always ready to give help and tips about traveling in HK. Location-wise the place is within 10 min walk to MTR and 2 stops away from central. There are also many eateries in nearby streets. It’s a bit troublesome as no WiFi is not provided, and I had to ask Shirley to share her mobile as hotspot.

host.host_about:
Hey travelers ! My name is Amine

I live and work in downtown Montreal. People usually describe me as a smily and a very friendly guy.

I traveled in nearly 50 countries around the globe and far from stopping there. There is so much to discover and to learn. 

What I like from travelling is the feeling of excitement to discover a new place, trying to communicate in a new language, meeting new people, trying new exotic food and learn from the others. It's great to break the routine and leave it's comfort zone.

Now that so many great Airbnb  hosts opened their doors to me, I feel it is my turn to open the door of my condo in downtown Montreal to other travellers.

Looking forward meeting you or hosting you :)

Amine

host.host_about:
Hello, I'm Rui Lé Costa.
I have created this project with the aim of showing Oporto to the world.
In its multiplicity of angles, this experienced and intimate city vibrates in secret places, landscapes, stories and events. Who lives there or passes by, feel it deeply.
Then, FEELPORTO passes through the common interest of the larger community of those who inhabit the city, also in the heart.
And because Oporto is part of the heart of the north of this country, its community expands through and beyond its borders. Therefore, this project is open to all interested in approaching this sense, promoting their ideas and interests on a regular basis.
This way, it can provide all visitors experiences and emotions parallel to the usual and special itineraries. I propose, therefore, that are also the unconditional city lovers, from north to south of Portugal and beyond, to be a part of this community FEELPORTO ... Because Port is Beautiful.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Opis oferty całkowicie oddawał faktyczny stan apartamentu.Apartament położony w centrum Porto 10 min
 na piechotę od starego miasta.Bardzo miły,punktualny,uśmiechnięty młody właściciel.Apartament bardzo ekskluzywny,nowoczesny,pachnący świeżością.Chce się tam wracać.

Nous avons séjourné à 9 pendant 5 jours dans ce magnifique appartement ! Très joliment décoré, il est agréable et conforme aux photos. Tout équipé !! Bruno, nous a très bien accueillis et nous a très bien conseillés sur les activités et restaurants à faire. Il est situé au pied du métro et est proche de certains lieux touristiques. (Nous avons tt fait à pied..). Le tout petit moins est l'odeur qui provient qq fois de la cuisine et la lumière automatique du couloir qui a tendance à réveiller la nuit... C'est un excellent rapport qualité-prix ! Je recommande.

Our experience was amazing!  Our host Bruno was gracious and kind!  He provided us great ideas for coffee shops and restaurants.  Also, highlighted a number of places for us to visit.  The unit itself was amazing!  Very spacious and clean.  Best of all the A/C worked great! :)

Would definitely stay again!  The location was fantastic and allowed us to park the car and walk around everywhere. 

Porto is truly a beautiful city and our time there was fantastic!  

Thanks again for everything!

The flat was truly amazing ! Space, good situation and with all the necessary. Rui and his team are true pro that will make your stay in Porto as best as possible. Always free to help in case, I truly recommend Rui and his flat !

We were 4 people staying and the experience in this flat was amazing. In reality it is as beautiful as on the pictures: new, very clean, comfortable, all prepared with bed sheets and towels and very luminous. The view from the balcony is fantastic! The neighborhood is very convenient for walking around town or traveling by Metro, and it has some terrific cafes, shops and bars all around it.
We had a small issue with an over booking in our last night of our stay, but they solved it with efficiency and professionalism in the best way possible, moved us to another very nice 02 small flats just 5 minutes away, in return they allowed us to have a late checkout in the next day and also as an apologize has offered us a free night for us to stay in the next time when we visit Porto again. Yupppp! what a great people!!!
I didn't meet Ruí in person, but all his team was friendly and very helpful, always  making sure that our experience in Oporto was a fantastic one. We definitely will be back in this great town and will stay with them again for sure! Thanks Tiago!
Très bel appart bien situé, très bien équipé. Au centre de porto, pas besoin de transport tout y est de proximité. L accueil est très professionnel à l heure.

Lovely apartment. Charming building. Great Location near the Market and Bolhao Metro stop. Very well equipped kitchen, and obviously recently refurbished, and although it rained a lot, the balcony was a great way to see the city. Wonderful base for our 4 day trip to Porto, which is an absolutely beautiful city. Very good value would highly recommend for a group of friends visiting Porto.
Shame no visitors book, would have love to have shared some of our experiences about restaurants, great local delis etc., with new arrivals. Thank You very much we loved it.

We had a very nice time in Oporto City Roofs. It is a nice, spacious apartment, well equipped, with 5 good beds (and a bed bank, which we did not use). It is located in the centre of Porto, an ideal location for a city trip. The metro is right at the corner. I can certainly recommend this place.

acabamos de retornar da nossa estadia no apartamento Feel Porto Downtown City. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, restaurantes, mercearias, padarias, farmácias, supermercados, tudo a alguns metros apenas. A distancia do apartamento da parte histórica da cidade também é ótima, conhecemos tudo a pé! Com relação ao imóvel, excelente apartamento, amplo, moderno, em um prédio antigo. Exatamente como nas fotos apresentadas. Não tenho nada a reclamar!
Awesome apartment with a great view over Porto. Lovely rooms and especially a new kitchen.

Tudo correu muito bem. O apartamento e excelente com todos os confortos modernos e muito estilo num edifício dos anos 50 reformado. É quase uma penthouse pois está no último piso e à vista é fabulosa com o por do sol.
Rui foi muito atencioso antes e durante nossa estadia,  mesmo que eu não o tenha encontrado pessoalmente por estar fora por alguns dias em férias com a família.
A equipe dele e eficiente e simpática. 
Gostaria de manter este apartamento como um ótimo segredo no Porto, mas isso seria egoísmo !

Perfect Porto! We booked a transfer from the airport which was a good idea seeing as there was 5 of us. Paulo was there waiting for us with a smile and whisked us off to the apartment which was only 20mins away. Apartment was in perfect location, metro, shopping and food! Our host Tiago was brilliant very informative and happy to answer any questions we had. The apartment was the right size for our group and beautifully decorated. We will definitely return! Thank you Tiago!

The apartment was modern and bright. Both bedrooms were good size and the large kitchen had everything we needed to cook several nights. Rui and his team were responsive to our calls and never left us waiting.
It was a great place to live

Bruno was easy to contact before our arrival. He gave us a very  warm welcome. He explained everything about the flat very well. He was very enthusiastic when we asked for suggestions of places to visit and restaurants to try and his suggestions were all very good. 
The apartment is immaculate. It is very contemporary and presumably very recently refurbished.The rooms are spacious and the lounge is very relaxing. The beds were very comfortable. The two bathrooms were super - wonderful showers and always plenty of hot water. Great to have the balconies and views.
The location of the apartment is really good. An easy walk down to the waterside- maybe 15 minutes? But the best most traditional restaurants were very close to the apartment. Also 2 supermarkets and some good places for breakfast.
Taxi rank very convenient.
A wonderful experience for our first trip to a wonderful city.
Thank you.

We loved the apartment. Beautiful,new and well equiped. The location is superb - best shoping nearby, coffee shop and taxis just down the stairs . We got great restaurants names from Rui's partner.
All in all we loved the place and would be happy to come again
Nice welcome from a Feel Porto representative with tips about Porto and practical info.

Un van nous attendait à l'aéroport pour nous conduire à l'appartement. Le check in  a été rapide et cordial avec un employé de Rui. L'appartement, spacieux et clair, est très bien situé, près du centre sans en avoir les nuisances, à deux pas du métro Bolhao, station de taxis en face. 
Seul point négatif: quelques soucis avec les évacuations de douche, d'où quelquefois une odeur désagréable (grande chambre).
Excellent place to stay. Well situated in downtown Porto, fully renovated in modern style,  fully equipped apartment. Perfect !
great apt.

Rui y todo el equipo han sido muy amables y los mails siempre se contestaron muy rapido. Ofrecen pick up service y taxi hacia el aeropuerto lo cual fue muy util ya que nuestro vuelo era muy temprano. El piso increible, hermoso, limpio y espacioso (eramos 5 personas) - casi mejor que en las fotos :) Y las duchas un suenio!! La ubicación perfecta para pasear por el centro de Oporto, justo al lado del metro y de la calle peatonal Santa Catarina con el mercado do Bolhao a 2 pasos para comprar productos frescos y cocinar en la cocina muy practica del piso! Todo un excito, volveremos con mucho gusto a ese alojamiento :)

Najlepszy apartament podczas naszej podróży po Portugalii. Rewelacyjny 140 metrowy penthouse , nowocześnie zaaranżowany.
Czysty, przestronny z bardzo dużymi sypialniami i dwiema łazienkami.
Świetna cena . Dobra lokalizacja w centrum Porto na ostatnim pietrze zabytkowej kamienicy, 10 minut piechotą od rzeki i sławnego mostu.
Bardzo dziękujemy  za doskonały pobyt. :)
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 108 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great time staying at this apartment. Very clean and organized. Good value and location. Easily take the metro right out the door. Or walk to the nearby attractions like the bridge, market, and tower.

This apartment is very well located, you couldn't dream of a better location. It's in the heart of the city and you are close to everything. The apartment is nice and big, perfect for large group. Very clean. However, there is no basic products like pepper or salt in the kitchen and we had some troubles with the oven. I would recommand this apartment mostly during hot season because it was really cold inside during winter.

Friendly, efficient check-in and check out. Great location, 10 minutes walk downtown and close to metro . Plenty of space and comfortable furnishings. Porto is fantastic, an interesting, historic city with a great vibe. Lovely countryside and coast also nearby.

This apartment was a dream come true. It looks just like the pictures, very modern and comfortable. The location was my favorite part, it was right in the center of town, we had no problem getting around on foot. We were welcomed with a helpful map, our host told us about some great restaurants in the surrounding area, where all the main sites were and how to get there on foot, and some great recommendations for port wine! I can't wait to come visit again!
Apartment was exactly as described. Everything was top notch from start to finish.

The apartment is beautiful, Rui and his team were there whenever we needed anything. The apartment comes with all the ammenties you need, including small things like salt, Pepper and olive oil.   the location is wonderful, very close to the centre but away come the noise of downtown.  The apartment is very modern and contemporary. I would definItley recommend this lovely apartment!
Renovated modern apartment with lots of light - centrally located. very nice host, apartment is run by professional agency with great service and customer orientation. we enjoyed a lot!

One word to describe it all.. " Flawless" . From our driver Mr. Paulo who picked us up at the airport to Ms Lara who waited for us with a smile and showed us around the lovely apartment, it was all perfect. The place is very well kept and clean . Nice little balconies add to the value having a good view of the city. 
Most of the attractions are a walking distance from the apartment. Our most cherished was the walk on Catarina street which was full of lively music and entertainment, a must do. 
If in Porto , this is where you want to be. 

Rohit
Anfitrião sempre disponível, o espaço é maravilhoso e super equipado. Limpeza nota 10 e localização excelente.
O apartamento é excelente e bem localizado. Os anfitriões foram muito atenciosos.
ewerting was perfect.

We spend a great time with our friend in Rui's appartement. Everything is very clean, with top range furniture (especially the beds, very comfortable). The appartment is in the center of the city, allowing us to discover the city on foot. Rui's people are very helpful and accommodating. We highly recommend this apartment for any kind of visitors (friends group or even family)

The apartment is very clean, modern and central. You get a great view of the city from the apartment since it is on the penthouse. There are restaurants and shops that are walkable from the area. There are trash bins located at the park that you can throw the apartments' wastes. The communication is superb! We had an issue with the apartment and it was resolved immediately. We recommend this apartment for families! We had a great time in Porto!
The location is great, at the central of the city. The apartment is clean and well-equipped. Friendly owner.
appartement confortable et agréable,  literie excellente, pièces spacieuses, ensoleillé, au  calme,  bien placé proche métro.  On se sent bien "ches Rui".....

Great appartement, very well equiped for a citytrip! We loved the location and the interior of the house. Great hosts, very friendly and helpful. We used the offered transfer and it was perfect. My only comment would be that the extra (folding) bed (we were with 7 adults) was a bit small for two adults. Nothing problematic but when you travel with 7 adults you might want to ask if you can have extra sheets and use the sofa bed in the living room. Overall i would definately reccomend this appertment!

O apto é excelente.
Atende em muito as expectativas.
Perto de vários locais.
Ficarei novamente numa outra oportunidade

Rui's place is a beautiful modern apartment, located just 15 minutes walk from Porto's Douro river and Luis bridge. 

The apartment is very spacious, clean and tidy, and has good views over the city. 

Rui and his team were helpful and provided suggestions on where to go for the best food. 

We were very pleased with the apartment.
Great apartment! Super modern. Very central. Close to public transportation. Great views!! Quiet! Great terrace

Magnifique appartement, moderne, tout confort. Tout neuf il a été très bien décoré et agencé. Très haut de gamme. Le quartier est très bien situé  et très vivant. L'accueil est top et très réactif. Superbe séjour. Je recommande  à 100%.

The apartment is great for families. We stayed for 2 weeks and it was very comfortable. Fresh air and nice natural light. Big kitchen with all the necessary appliances.Even a nespresso machine.Huge closets in both rooms with plenty of hangers.   The market is right across the street. Very convenient. Nice coffee shops around.

Excelente apartamento, muito bem cuidado. Óptimas instalações, o único problema foi um cheiro desagradável com origem no wc da suite, provavelmente devido à canalização antiga do prédio, embora o apartamento fosse todo remodelado. A localização é perfeita para conhecer a cidade, tanto a pé como de transportes públicos (metro, autocarro e praça de táxis à porta). 2 supermercados, inúmeros restaurantes e lojas a 2-3 minutos a pé. Óptima comunicação com a equipa responsável pelo apartamento (empresa Feel Porto), estiveram sempre disponíveis para ajudar e atender aos pedidos (almofadas extra por exemplo). Boas dicas de restaurantes (obrigada, Raquel!). Boa opção para um fim de semana em família, com conforto e, mais uma vez, na melhor zona para ficar no Porto. Recomendo!
O imóvel é muito bem localizado. Está equipado com todos os aparelhos necessários para uma estadia confortável. Sentimo-nos em casa!

A modern pad with an awesome view. The elevator was in maintenance for all three days we stayed there, so we climbed a lot of stairs to the 5th floor. Also, the bathrooms were clean, but had a bad smell coming though the pipes.
A lovely comfortable stylish apartment.  Perfect location.  We loved it.

Nuestra estancia en Oporto fue estupenda. El apartamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos, muy espacioso y cuidado al mas mínimo detalle. La localización es muy buena, rodeada de restaurantes locales y se puede ir andando a cualquier sitio. El ascensor estaba siendo reparado durante nuestra estancia y los chicos de Feelporto nos ayudaron a subir las maletas y también se ofrecieron a bajarlas. Ademas las recomendaciones de Raquel fueron geniales. Si algún día volvemos a Oporto, sin duda repetiremos.

Je recommande vivement cet appartement conforme aux photos accueil très professionnel. Réactivité au top nous avons beaucoup apprécié la petite collation portugaise à notre arrivée! l'agence nous a même téléphoner pour que l'on n'oublie pas de changer d'heure appartement central tout peut se faire à pied rien à redire ! Je recommande également le transfert privé aéroport à l'appartement chauffeur très professionnel également et très serviable.

Our Porto stay at Jorge/Rui’s place was positive.  The location was spectacular, close to many amenities and walkable to the city center.  There was a lot of good recommendations given by our host and he marked up our map loaded with things to do.  While the location was great, we needed to switch places because the top level apartment was full of sewer odors coming from all the plumbing fixtures.  It was difficult to spend time in the apartment.  We called the “Feel Porto” agency and disclosed our situation.  They thought they could hide the smell with candles, but they soon realized this was a much larger building problem.  They ended up switching our apartment to the 1st floor apartment in the same building which was wonderful and did not have any odors.  The place was spacious, strong wifi, cable tv, and great heater.  The beds were comfortable and clean.  

My recommendation would be to reserve the 1st floor apartment only until they correct the plumbing issues on the 5th floor.  Nothing extremely negative about “Feel Porto” agency, they were professional and responsive.  However, I don’t think they should have rented the 5th floor apartment to begin with and we needed to interrupt our day to switch places.  They certainly were apologetic and acknowledged they would make required repairs.
excellent and easy communication

My family and I visited Porto in June 2018, and the FeelPorto apartment was the perfect place of our exploration of that lovely city!  The entire team at FeelPorto was very helpful, communicative, and accommodating, even helping us arrange transfer to the airport. The apartment is in a perfect location for getting around the city, and convenient to restaurants, shopping, and services.  There were many thoughtful touches in the well-appointed apartment, and it was very clean and comfortable.  We will definitely recommend staying here to family and friends.  We hope to return someday soon!

Appartement intéressant , non loin du centre mais dans un endroit tranquille.l’appartement est très propre et le service est satisfaisant. Il faudra régler le problème d’odeurs dans l’appartement. Séjour  agréable
Great location, the apartment is amazing -as good as it looks in the photos, Rui and his team are super quick and pro-active, could not have gone better! thank you.
Great spot. Would stay there again.

This flat was gorgeous. So comfortable and clean. Showers were amazing and the unit had everything you didn’t even know you needed. The view is spectacular and the location is walking distance to all the charms of old Porto. We had such a wonderful time.  We had wonderful attention and every question answered quickly. We loved the restaurant recommendations as well. Very wonderful time. Thank you!
Vista linda da cidade. Ótima localização! Muito limpo e arejado. A comunicação com o anfitrião foi muito rápida e eficaz. Voltaria a me hospedar nessa acomodação.
Ottima posizione e appartamento molto bello. Assolutamente consigliato
Best place to stay in Porto. No more to say, just don't hesitate to boot this apartment and enjoy the the real hospitality!

name: Kocamustafapaşa’da Bayana Uygun Paylaşımlı Daire.

name: 贝壳—香港繁华中宁静的休憩小筑
summary: 这是一间温馨的小屋,拥有着三个房间,其中两间是屋主的私人空间｡还有一间拥有独立私密睡房是您的私人领地｡它有一张1.5米的双人床,适合最多2个人拥有一晚舒适的睡眠｡我们很高兴的跟您共同享用我们精心打造的,有一点点old fasion的客厅和餐厅｡客厅和餐厅的木质家具都是我们精心从世界各地淘来的老家具,譬如说樟木箱子作为茶几,长条桌是有50多年的美国家具,另一侧的中式柜子则是花梨木的｡德式的餐桌厚实简单,谁也想不到它已经有过百年的历史,它的所有者是一个德国的老奶奶,我猜想在这个餐桌上,上演了无数次温馨的家庭聚会和老奶奶亲手做的德国美食吧! 屋主喜欢上世纪70年代美国乡村风的室内装饰,所以墙纸采用了具有时代特色的湖蓝色和枫叶黄的主色调,会客厅和餐厅的照明采用了古典彩色拼装玻璃的乡村风格以及温暖的蜡烛｡在我们忙碌和疲劳的一天后,三五知己坐在会客厅享受一杯红酒,可以舒缓一天的疲乏｡ 在会客厅的条案和橱柜上,我们放置了一些从全球各地搜罗来的小物品,虽然价值不高,但是可以跟朋友一起分享我们的旅途和趣事｡
space: 三房两厅,70平方米(700平方尺),其中有两间是房屋主人的房间｡还有一间是提供给入住客人｡里面有1.5m的双人床,茶几,床头灯和一把椅子｡会客室､餐厅､厨房､洗浴间是共用的｡ 洗浴间不久前刚重新翻新,非常的整洁,餐厅可以制作简餐,有基本的烹饪设备｡

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 不会失望!
这次是很多次来香港最好的一次体验,毕竟是带着父亲一起出游,有公用的客厅,不需要挤在好小的宾馆里,而且离铜锣湾F1出口非常近,去哪里都很方便,房间干净房东热情.房东是到香港好多年很酷的一对情侣,非常巧的是我们同一天的飞机飞印尼,在印尼还一起吃了两次饭,交流旅游信息,及其推荐在他家入住,别等了,就定他家.
和房东沟通很顺利,房源位置也很棒!希望再来
在一天的风尘仆仆和心情煎熬后的午夜 坐下来喝杯水 突然发现房东的家 好精致 好喜欢 很不错

她们家真的非常大,三室两厅｡图片根本看不出来!我在香港住过很多家,但是这是第一次住到这么大的｡原来香港也是有大房子哒,哈哈｡

之前就在他们家对面那栋大厦住过,房间都不干净｡也有在他们家后面时代广场住过,也是非常吵｡整个房子很小,隔出了三间房,但是隔应太差｡

她们家很温馨,房东人也很好｡比我还担心着急我的入住｡提前好几天就联系我,然后又给我发很多入住信息｡并且在入住当天,主动发消息关心我是否顺利入住｡真的很用心,我用Ab好几年来,遇见了很多房东｡从来都是自己主动去问,然后找房东｡很少有房东主动跑来跟进的｡这一点非常棒~
入住刚好May在家,第一时间就告知了家里热水器如何使用的方法｡以前那些自助入住的,写的不清楚,之前在一家也是这种老式热水器,洗澡都弄不出热水｡｡｡发消息房东回复也不及时｡
这家房东是大陆人,沟通也是无障碍哦~

虽然之前待了短短的一天,但是也是完美的｡

地理位置不要太好了,整个铜锣湾购物宝地随你逛,楼下对面有一家很大的Adidas!大厦就在马路边,非常好找并且很安全~

推荐~性价比真的很高｡
正儿八经是自己家拿来做房东,而不是那种专门为了挣钱,租几套房拿来做的｡相对来说更有人情味儿~
房子很美 喜歡這種典雅的房間
很棒的住宿体验,不同于酒店可以感觉到回家的味道,邻里也都主动打招呼,彼此照顾

name: Lovely Single room in heart of Wan Chai
summary: Sunny cosy and comfortable bedroom and living space in a very convenient location. The room has a single bed and good space including a wardrobe and drawers for your use. The living space has a small dining table which you can work at, a sofa to relax on and enough space to do yoga should you wish (mat and dumbbells supplied). The adjoining kitchen is modern and includes the washing machine. There is a rooftop area directly above that you are welcome to use. Please note it is a 5th floor walkup.
space: My apartment is modern, sunny and super clean. It's cosy and compact but still has a sense of space. The bedroom has a single bed and enough space for a single fold out mattress should you require. The 2nd person is HK$100 extra pr night.

neighborhood_overview: My apartment is in the heart of the Wan Chai Market which gives you an insight to the local Chinese culture. It is 4 minutes from Wan Chai MTR and the bus stops for all major routes (including the bus to the airport). It is a 10-15 min walk to the HKConvention Centre and many tourist destinations are easily reached by public transportation. Locally there are many many! restaurants from Chinese to Asian to European. Wan Chai also is famous for its bars and nightlife. The Happy Valley racecourse is a 15 min walk away  and there are temples and The Bowen Running trail also within a 10 min walk. Shopping at Times Square or Central is also very handy. The star ferry across Victoria harbour to Kowloon runs from the Wan Chai pier.
transit: Walking in the cooler months is excellent for really getting to experience the Wan Chai area. Buses tram and MTR are all 3 to 4 minutes away. Taxis are cheap and plentiful From airport - Airport Express (24 minutes to Central), then taxi or MTR to Wan Chai ext A3.  Or bus A11. Alight at Southorn Stadium, wall East towards Johnston and Wan Chai Road, and turn right.  Taxi to and from the airport will be the same time as the Airport Express, (plus taxi), but it will cost $300+. We are located minutes from the  stops for buses and minibuses which can take you anywhere on Hong Island -Kowloon -New Territories. Don't forget to take a ride on  the historic Hong Kong Tramway which is a 2 minute walk away! An OCTOPUS card can be purchased at any MTR station and can be used on all public transport as well as 7/11 convenience stores and supermarkets. The card costs $50 which is refunded when you return the card at the end of your trip. You then load the desired amount of money. It can be topped
access: Access to shared living room kitchen and bathroom. Also a rooftop balcony above the 5th floor.
interaction: I am available on phone via call (Hidden by Airbnb) (Hidden by Airbnb) and msm to assist. Due to long work days I am not around alot and so have minimal contact with my guests. I'm always happy to catch up when possible and welcome the guests to make themselves at home.
house_rules: *Please remove shoes inside the apartment. House slippers are provided if desired. *No illegal drugs or excessive drinking *If swipe card for electronic keypad on entrance door is lost/broken there is a HK$400 replacement cost *Please clean up after yourself in the kitchen and be considerate of the shared spaces.

name: Beautiful forest hill view! 2 bed/2bath
summary: Forest Hill is a beautiful building adjacent to Westmount and a few minutes of Downtown.   Our complex is located front of Mont Royal Park.   Easy access to public transportation, the (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) buses are in a few steps from the building or 8 min walk to Côte-des-Neiges Metro.   The apartments are quite sound-proof.   Services available in the building: A gym, Swimming pool, sauna, Depanneur   *Laundry room located on the same level as the appartement .  The appartement is VERY spacious.
space: The master bedroom has its own bathroom and walk in closet. The second one has a big closet. Both bedrooms are spacious and each of them have a tv inside!  Forest Hill est un magnifique immeuble adjacent à Westmount et à quelques minutes du Centre-ville branché de Montréal. Le complexe est situé en face du parc Mont Royal, l’endroit idéal pour les promenades, l’entraînement, le vélo, le patinage et plus encore. Facilité d'accès aux transports en commun: autobus 165, 11 et 435 juste à quelques pas du bâtiment ou à 8 minutes à pied du métro Guy Concordia. Les services : Dépanneur Piscine Salle de lavage Salle d’entraînement L’appartement est TRÈS spacieuse.  La première chambre est très grande et elle a sa propre salle de bain et une garde-robe style « walk-in ». Les deux chambres ont une télévision!

reviews.comments: Great host. Central location. Totally worth what I paid.

Visiting Istanbul wouldn't be the same without Şahin's hospitality. Everything was perfect. The room and bathroom were clean and cosy. They are designed with passion and thoroughness. Our host was helpful and friendly.  The location also is good. The apartment is situated nor too close nor too far from the center of Kadıköy.

Beklentilerinizi tamamen karsilayabilecek bir ev. Dizayn, konfor, ikram, temizlik konularinda gayet basarili  ve evaahibinin yardimsever bir kisi oldugundan dolayi cok dusunmeden rezervasyonunuzu tamamlayip, konaklamanizi tavsiye ederim.

Kendisine misafirperverliginden dolayı çok teşekkür ederim. Oda biraz küçük ama evin tamamına baktığımızda gayet memnun ayrıldım.  
Daire gayet titiz dekore edilmiş ev sahibi beyfendi zaten iç mimar olmasının tabi ki artısı.
gelecek konuklara tavsiyem güler yüzlü ev sahibi ve konforlu bir deneyim yaşayacaksınız.

Şahin’s spacious apartment is one of the highlights during our stay in Kadikoy. It is close to the main street which enables us to go to cool areas within walking distance. Also because it is on the top floor of the building so relatively quiet. Şahin is a really nice host. He accepted my request in very last minute on a late evening and welcomed me and my bf warmly. There was wine provided  in our room! He  was also very helpful as a local guide. Will surely stay next time. Thank you Şahin!

Sahin is a great host, he has been very helpful and welcoming throughout our stay. The unit is located in a very central part of Kadikoy and extremely accessible to the hip Moda district as well as the historic sites of Eminonu through the ferry which is in walking distance. We were able to walk anywhere and didnt even need public transit except for the ferry. I would definitely recommend this unit and would come back.

Stan izgleda super, ali mi nismo znali da on zivi sa nama . Od celog stana smo imali malu sobu i kupatilo koje smo delili. Malo smo se zbog toga razocarali, lokacija je super i on je super . Samo nam je smetalo sto nismo bili sami .
Çok konuşma şansımız olmadı ancak kendisi misafirperver ve şık bir oda. Lokasyon olarak çok güzel bir yerde.
Отличная компактная и уютная комната. Есть все необходимое от одноразовых тапочек до электрического чайника. Все чисто. Удобная кровать. Рекомендую !
Konum mukemmel, odalar gayet tatminkar, Şahin bey fazlasiyla yardimsever.Tek eksik binada asansor olmamasi.

My stay at Sahin's place was nothing but amazing. From the moment i first contacted him to my check out, Sahin ( his partner and mum included) have made my stay incredible. Amenities were sufficiently provided, the whole place was beautiful decorated. I would like to thank Sahin and his family for their wonderful hospitality.  Would definitely recommend!
Evin konumu gayet güzel, Şahin bey konuksever, oda tertemiz kısacası her şey güzel :)

We had an amazing stay at Şahin’s place, the offered  hospitality is out of this world.  His mom is a real sweetheart - happy I could improve my Turkish with her! The location is the bomb - just around the corner from the Kadiköy bull (Kadiköy is the best neighborhood in Istanbul in my opinion)... bathroom not super clean (only dust but hey, fair to mention it) but definitely good value for money - totally recommend this place and Şahin as a host! Thanks a lot.

name: LOCATION! PVT Double BR w/Balcony across the BEACH
summary: Come to our lovely home in the most exciting neighborhood in Barcelona. Located very close to the beach and surrounded by typical pintoresc bars and tapa restaurants, our home connects local lifestyle with vacation-mood spirit.  You will have your own double bedroom and balcony facing a beautiful open square and will share with us the rest of the apartment: feel free to cook, rest, read, watch tv as if you were at your own home.

After each use, please clean up after yourself: the dishes, working surface,dining table, etc. No pets are allowed in the building.

name: Lovely and Modern 3-Bed Apartment in Lesseps
summary: Welcome to my lovely and modern apartment in the lovely neighbourhood of Lesseps. Plenty of natural light  and with all the amenities you may need, my apartment is the perfect location for your stay in Barcelona. You can not be better located as you are already at the centre. With great transport links, you will be able to get to any part of the city.
space: My comfortable and lovely apartment is the perfect base when visiting Barcelona. It is located very close to the city center in the vibrant area of Lesseps. The living area has plenty of natural light and it has a modern and chic decoration that creates an incredible atmosphere. With chic wooden touches and elegant decoration you will enjoy every moment you spend here. After a day exploring Barcelona there is nothing better than relaxing on the sofa and watching TV or reading a book. There is also a lovely balcony! There is a separate lovely dining area so you can enjoy lovely dinners. You can use the space to work with your laptop and catch up with emails. The kitchen has a cozy design and beautiful decoration. If you like cooking then you will have a good time in the stylish, fully equipped kitchen creating your best recipes!  In the master bedroom, you will also find a super comfortable double bed with fresh luxury linens, what more do you need for a good night’s sleep? There is a l

There is a separate lovely dining area so you can enjoy lovely dinners. You can use the space to work with your laptop and ca
neighborhood_overview: My apartment could not be better located. It is located in the vibrant area of Lesseps, a residential and lovely are pretty close to the center and great transport links.   The neighbourhood is filled with green parks, shopping areas, interesting sights, and narrow and quiet streets. The greatest aspect of this neighborhood is that it is extremely calm so you will have a good night’s sleep  and total tranquillity. In less than 10 minutes walking you have Turó Parc. You can not miss it. You are quite close to the neighbourhood of Gràcia. Here you will find plenty of typical Catalan and Spanish restaurants, lovely squares and traditional stores. My apartment is surrounded by plenty of supermarkets, stores so you will be able to get anything you need during your stay. .
notes: According to the Law, you will be asked at the moment of the check-in for your IDs. Hope this is not an inconvenience. In the building, there will be some apartments making some minor refurbishments, you might find some disturbances because of this. We apologize in advance for this.
transit: My apartment could not be better located.  It is located quite close to  the city centre with great transport links to get to any part of the city.  In less than five minutes, you have the Bus V15 that will take you in less than 20 minutes to the iconic Plaza Cataluña. In less than 10 minutes, you have Lesseps Tube Station. From here you can get to Passeig de Gràcia, Diagonal, Poble Sec, Palau Reial. From here, you can also go to Sants Estació and, from here, you can get the train that will take you directly to the airport.
access: The guests have access to the whole property.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away; they are a short-lets management service team who know Barcelona like the back of their hand! I trust them to look after you and give you a warm welcome! If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the channel platform.
house_rules: NO PETS. NO SMOKING. NO PARTIES.

host.host_about:
Hi! My name is Cristina and I'm from Barcelona. 
In my free time I love to discover new places and cultures.

name: Gaudí - Sagrada Familia
space: Fantastic and cute-designed 2 bedroom apartment located in Avinguda Gaudí, next the Sagrada Família. The location of this apartment is privileged. It is located in Avinguda Gaudí, beautiful avenue that connects two of the most important symbols of modernism. The well-known Sagrada Familia, Antoni Gaudi’s masterpiece and the Hospital de Sant Pau, designed by architect Domènech i Montaner. This pedestrian avenue is full of life. The balconies in the living room allow people to enjoy the views of the Sagrada Familia while taking a coffee or simply sunbathing. The apartment consists of 2 double bedrooms. The first one has a double bed and a dress room that has enough space to store the belongings. The second bedroom has two single beds. It also has a lot of storage space. Both bedrooms face the courtyard, so it means zero noise. The living room is spacious, bright and very comfortable. It consists of a table where 6 people can sit and a comfortable sofa. The sofa can be converted into a co

host.host_about: "Sweet Dreams Barcelona" has some apartments in the city to make you feel at home when traveling to Barcelona

reviews.comments: Great apartment, everything done beautiful and with great taste. Fantastic location. For my understanding and in compare with canadian pricing is a bite overpriced. Especially painful are the 10% that the website charge for the service.
This was a really great apartment, nicely furnished and very comfortable. Good TV, comfortable beds, great kitchen and bath and located close to bakeries and good eateries.

Danis Wohnung hat unseren Erwartungen entsprochen! Schöne, saubere Wohnung, zentral gelegen. Ausgestattet mit allem, was benötigt wird. Die kommunikation mit Dani lief hervorragend!

Insegsamt: Jederzeit wieder!

Appartement très sympathique, confortable (4 amis, + une qui nous a rejoint quelques jours) et relativement bien placé car à 5 min à pied du métro. Il était calme ce qui n'est pas négligeable dans une ville comme Barcelone. Le balcon est également très agréable même si petit. 
Les contacts avec Dani ont été très simples, il a répondu à toutes nos questions très rapidement, et la remise des clés a été facile.

The apartment is very nice and central. We were three in the apartment. The apartment is suitable for 4 persons. Everything is there, what you need for everyday life.  The house is very quiet. The neighborhood we have virtually unnoticed. Undoubtedly on the avinguda gaudi a lot is going on (until late night). Because the bedrooms and their windows are to the rear, it is very quiet there at night.
Contact with Dani was always very pleasant. The handing over of the apartment was very easy. Absolut no problems. If we come back we will certainly stay here again.
Thank you very much
Pia, Stella & Rüdiger

Great location, breakfast on the balcony overlooking Sagrada Familia is wonderful start of the day during a holiday in Barcelona. The apartment has everything you need and even more. The apartment is  really cozy. 
Dani`s hospitality, his helpness and advices made our stay comfortable and memorable.
With the open windows can be heard the life of neighbors, snoring and  knock of forks. To sleep in silence you can only conditioning.

We had an amazing stay at Dani's apartment! You can see the church from the balcony, and the apartment looks just like the pictures. It has everything you need for a great stay - the location is great, just a 5 minute walk to the metro and the same to sagrada familia. Thanks Dani - would definitely stay again!

Appartement joliment et chaleureusement décoré, pas du tout impersonnel. Propre et fonctionnel, avec cuisine complètement équipée + machine à laver. On a l'impression d'etre comme à la maison, donc on prend vite ses marques et il y fait bon vivre. Deux petits balcons dont un avec 2 chaises et 1 table permettent de  bouquiner au soleil, de prendre un verre en fin de journée. L'appartement est à 4 min à pied du métro et de la Sagrada familia et donne sur une rue large et piétonne bordée d'arbres. Quartier calme. Dani est réactif et disponible et a été très souple pour les heures de check in et out. Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement.

숙소가 아기자기하게 꾸며져 있어서 너무 마음에 들었습니다.
화장실도 깨끗하고, 부엌에도 식기가 잘 갖추어져 있어서 이용하기 편했어요. 다만, 세탁기를 사용하기가 너무 어려웠어요. 사용 설명서가 있으면 좋을 것 같아요!
잘 지내다 갑니다 ^^

L'appartement est vraiment très agréable, bien équipé, avec une décoration chaleureuse, et il est, détail important, très propre. On s'y sent bien. De plus il est idéalement bien situé pour découvrir Barcelone, avec des facilités pour circuler en métro et il y a des commerces tout autour. L'avenue Gaudi nous plonge directement dans l'ambiance de la ville. C'est super ! Dani a été très sympathique et reste disponible si besoin. Je recommande cet appartement pour son charme (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Great apartment, really enjoyed living in them, Many thanks Dani. Great place, from the window of the Sagrada Familia, clean and casual  maintained place. I put the highest score for him. Great place for living. Nice and quiet. Quick communication and answers with owner. Thanks a lot !!!

Dani ha sido un muy buen anfitrión. No lo conocimos pero estuvimos todo el tiempo en contacto y nos ayudo con todo lo q necesitábamos. El departamento es hermoso tal cual se ve en las fotos. Muy bien equipado, éramos 5 personas y nos resultó genial. La ubicación con vista a la sagrada familia desde el balcón fue increíble!

El departamento está totalmente preparado para vivir en él de manera permanente, con buen gusto para la decoración y con suficientes libros para poder pasarse un buen rato de lectura. Su ubicación resultó excelente, a dos cuadra de la Sagrada Familia y la estación del Metro. Cerca del él encontramos pequeños supermercados y charcuteríaspara poder hacer las compras necesaria para tener una buena estancia y los suficientes restaurantes para poder comer en ellos si no quiere uno cocinar.
La cocina bien dotada de utensilios y algunos complementos (azúcar, sal, vinagre, pastas) que te ayudan a salir en tu primer día si es que llegas tarde (aunque cerca del departamento hay un super 24 horas). El barrio se me hizo muy seguro y tranquilo. Sin duda que volvería a hospedarme en él.

I highly recommend this apartment. We were four women with a two year kid with us and stayed here for four days. Communication with Dani was very easy and he was available in a matter of five minutes if we needed his help with something in the apartment (in this case he had to come and explain us how to use the fancy oven :)  He also ordered a bigger taxi for us during our departure. 

The apartment welcomes you into a house with taste - the owner (an architect) has designed the house and use to live here. The apartment description is very accurate and it was clean. It is in a safe and central location with walking distance to Metro station. There are many restaurants right at this street. Overall, staying in this apartment was a very good decision and a good value for money! If we come to Barcelona again, we will definitely stay here.

Dani's apartment was fantastic. It was clean, cool, convenient and comfortable!! The location was great and we had a café con leche at the café every morning. The Crepe restaurant next door had delicious breakfasts, too. 
We had a great vacation thanks to Air B& B and Dani!!

Dani was great meeting us and showing us around. The apartment was so beautiful and clean. It is even nicer than it looks in the pictures I think. And the view is amazing. Lots of restaurants and stores in walking distance. Would highly recommend

La casa está bien situada y es muy acogedora. El barrio es bastante tranquilo y las habitaciones al dar a un patio interior son muy silenciosas. El apartamento está muy limpio y muy bien decorado, la cocina totalmente equipada. Ideal para pasar unos días. La entrega de las llaves fue rápida y sencilla. Muy recomendable.

La casa è molto bella e curata, fornita di tutto quello che serve, funzionale e pulita. Il quartiere è centrale e molto tranquillo, nonostante sia vicino alla sagrada, posto invaso dai turisti. La via è pedonale, con alberi e molto silenziosa e la casa è davvero tranquilla. Il soggiorno è molto luminoso, sin dalle prime ore del mattino, le camere, la cucina e il bagno, invece, hanno finestre molto piccole e sono poco luminose, ma non è una cosa che influisce molto, visto che dal mattino fino a sera tardi siamo stati sempre in giro per Barcellona. Vika, la ragazza che ci ha accolti è stata molto gentile e disponibile. La casa ci è piaciuta molto, e il quartiere e la via dove si trova sono deliziosi, la consiglio!!!

This great apartment is worth every penny.
Everything was fine and well equipped.
Nice neighborhood with everything you need - supermarket, bakeries, restaurants as well as the great sights sagrada familia and st pau hospital.
Very near to the metro you can reach nearly every sight within 30 minutes.
We felt like at home.
We highly recommend this apartment.
Loved the apartment, everything was true to pictures and the location was central. It was very comfortable and homely and I would definitely stay here whenever I'm in Barcelona.
This flat was very well located for a trip to Barcelona and we found the host to be flexible regarding our arrival and departure times.
房子很不好我们都非常喜欢,地理位置十分好,离景点很近附近就有餐厅超市｡非常完美的旅行

L'appartement de Dani est central, très bien situé à deux pas de la Sagrada Familia.
Il dispose de tous les équipements nécessaires pour un séjour en famille ou entre amis. 
Très bien entretenu, c'était un endroit parfait pour découvrir la ville. Nous y retournerons sans hésiter !

Great location to transport,supermarket,cafe,restaurants.
We caught a taxi ti Park Guell that cost€6 which was same price and quicker than the metro.
Taxis are cheap in Barcelona.
Neighbour complained about our noise which could be an issue if you are not as quiet as mice.Just me and my teenagers,no partying from our end??
Otherwise yes it is a good place
Pastries at Choclate box are yum
Building was quiet and not on street used by cars. All amenities nearby.  Very clean, modern and well appointed.
Big flat near Sagrada familia.

it was really great time to stay in the apartment.
good location, good atmosphere etc.
Thanks Dani

I wanted to thank you Dani and Vika, because we spent 3 wonderful days with my family in Barcelone(with baby 11month)
The Dani's apartment is very nice. All the description picture are well and trues ! 
The localisation is Very sympatic, Right next to the Sagrada Familia and Metro.
With many shops around the flat ! It's really perfect ! 
Thanks Dani
Great location with beautiful views of street and sagrada familia!
Fabulous location. 5 minutes from la Sagrada Famíglia, subway stops, great restaurants. Lovely apartment. Highly recommended.

The place even looked even better than what I was expecting. Situated conveniently near Sagrada Familia. Shops and restaurants just below the building.
Only downside is the lift..you have to go up a few steps to get to it.
A very complete apartment, modern and comfortable. Location is very central just next to The top attraction in the city - S Familia. Excellent place yet quiet.
Great location and amenities.everyting went well with check-in.only downside was that elevator starts on the 1st floor!

Dani's place is centrally located. An easy walk to and from Sagrada Familia metro.  It was comfortable and the location cannot be beat. Loved the little balcony with views of the street life below. I would stay here again.

Apartment was exactly as described. Wonderful cafes downstairs for breakfast lunch and dinner. Sagrada Familia was viewable from the balcony and all was wonderfully located. My daughters enjoyed the colors of the apartment and the two beds for each of them. The washer was nice to freshen our clothes through the trip. Wonderfully decorated and was a nice home away from home.

Great apartment (spotlessly clean) overlooking a lovely pedestrianised avenue less than 2 blocks from La Sagrada de Familia and metro system.  From here it was really easy to see the sights of Barcelona and visit the beach using public transport.
Très bel appartement, conforme à la description et proche des transports en commun, vue sur la Sagrada et quartier animé ! L'accueil a été chaleureux ! À recommander

The appartment was perfect for four grown ups, it's well equipped and it was very clean. We very much appreciated the little balcony with the view to Sagrada and to the busy life on the street below. The communication with Dani before the trip was punctual and Vika, who was stand- in at our arrival was very helpful, and over more flexible about the hour for departure. We will certainly consider to return to Danis appartment again .
여러분 여기 정말 좋아요. 조금 비싸다 생각할 수도 있지만 그만큼 깨끗하고 잘 되어 있답니다 호스트도 짱짱 친절

We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona. Dani reassured us that everything was calm despite pending independence. And it was! The apartment is great and very well equipped, everything is within walking distance (bakeries, small supermarkets, restaurants, Metro station - and, of course, the Sagrada Familia).  There is still so much to see, I guess we will have to come again....
Thanks a lot!

Tolle, gemütliche, charmante, gut ausgestattete Ferienwohnung in einem angenehmen Viertel! Wir haben uns mit unseren beiden Kindern (10 und 12 Jahre) sehr wohl und sicher gefühlt! Viele Einkaufs- und Essensmöglichkeiten direkt vor der Tür, nur ein paar Schritte zur Sagrada Familia und von dort gute Metro-Anbindung überall hin! Schlafzimmer liegen ruhig im hinteren Teil der Wohnung.

Appartamento molto ampio, pulito e curato benissimo in Avinguada de Gaudì in pieno centro di Barcellona con vista sulla Sagrata Famiglia. Ottimo per famiglie di 4 persone. Servito bene con i servizi, la metropolitana dista 300 metri. Nelle vicinanze ci sono diversi supermarket molto ben forniti. Viktoria e Dani sono host cordiali e molto gentili.

We loved our stay in Barcelona.  Dani's apartment is everything and more than described.  The location was wonderful and we had an outstanding time.  Would definitely stay here again if I ever get the opportunity to visit again.

My wife, daughter and I stayed at Dani’s place for a week. We loved the apartment for it’s proximity and direct view of Segrada Familia. We enjoyed many coffees sitting on the balcony and admiring it from a distance. The Metro is just a short walk down the street and transportation to and from most of Barcelona’s tourist attractions were easily accessible. The apartment is large and beds were comfortable. Dani was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay. We would come back again.

Un apartamento cómodo, muy bien dotado y a dos cuadras de la Sagrada Familia. 
Dani estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente.

Estivemos hospedados eu e minha família do dia 19/07 ao dia 27/07. Casa bem localizada, rua com bares, restaurantes e mercados.  Metrô , pontos de ônibus tudo bem próximo. Infelizmente tivemos que esparar aproximadamente 1:30h na porta para o check-in devido atraso do anfitrião. Utensílios de cozinha guardados sujos, copos, canecas, talheres.... aquecedor elétrico de água guardado sujo com resto de leite. 
No dia do check out que estava marcado para as 11h, a equipe de limpeza chegou as 10:40h, apertando a campainha sendo que estávamos ainda dentro do nosso horário.  Nos sentimos sendo expulsos da casa, todos na porta nos esperando sair.  Um absurdo.  Fora esses episódios negativos estar em Barcelona foi sensacional.

Dani is a great host, he agreed to drop our luggage before 2 pm the day we arrived and leave our luggage after 11 am the day we left. He agreed to supply an extra towel for a 5th person and delivered it quickly. The place is big enough, central and a great value for money for more than 4 guests.

The appartment is very nice and it is placed in a wonderfull pedestrian area (Avinguda Gaudi) with a gorgeous view to the Sagrada Familia. Very well served by public transportation (Metro and Bus are very close). Around the appartment there are several TAPS place, restourants and supermarkets. The appartment have all items you may need, including coffe machine, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer.
If you plan to stay in Barcellona.....don't miss it.

Our family of four (two teenage children) thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Location was great and there are many restaurants and coffee places nearby that make breakfast and dinner easy to figure out.  The place was clean and modern and had a great use of space. We appreciated the 2 sets of keys which gave us some autonomy as a family.  Overall a wonderful place, well set up and great location!! Would definitely come back!!
This apartment is in a great location with everything you need. Very stylish & very clean. Hosts were helpful
L’appartement est bien situé et confortable. Les équipements sont bien appréciables. L’environnement est top (donne sur une rue piétonne).

An awesome place to stay. Great location - quiet and secure apartment which was very comfortable for us and two children. Would absolutely recommend booking Dani’s place. Thanks so much to him for all his help and advice with our trip.
Daniel
Melbourne

Great apartment and location close to Sagrada Familia. We traveled with our three small children and were very happy with the apartment.

The apartment was extremely neat and clean. Comfortable beds and ample space for hanging out. Loved having the small balcony to sit out on after the kids were in bed. Always great people watching! Dani also had everything you would need for little kids - high chair, crib, a couple toys, even a potty :) No bathtub, however, just a shower (but he did have an infant bathtub available).

The apartment is on the "first floor" but it's really more like the second or third. There's an elevator but you have to go up a few stairs to get to it which was sometimes an inconvenience with our stroller and three kids, but we managed fine.

So easy to get to Metro and also the hop-on-hop-off buss stops. There are a couple parks on either side of the Sagrada Familia great for younger kids. The walk to/from the Sagrada Familia is full of restaurants and cafes with outdoor seating, shops, markets, etc. I was able to walk a couple blocks to a full service grocery store as well. We felt totally comfortable walking back to the apartment at night as well. 

Dani was readily available before our arrival, always responding promptly to my emails. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

Appartamento situato in ottima posizione a 5 minuti dalla metro e dalla Sagrada Família. Appartamento silenzioso, ma poco luminoso, con 1 letto matrimoniale e 1 letto singolo + 1 letto estraibile ma posizionato in basso. Bagno confortevole  con ottima doccia ma senza bidet.

name: Loft 3
summary: Un apartamento acogedor como se puede ver en las imágenes, tranquilo y muy limpio. Nuestra oferta se adapta a quienes visitan Barcelona con propósitos decentes (viajes, estudios, negocios) Nuestra amigable ayuda y hospitalidad también estará disponible según sea necesario. An apartment cozy as can be seen in the images, quiet and very clean.  Our offer fits visitors Barcelona purposes decent (travel, studies, business). Our friendly help and hospitality also available as needed.

neighborhood_overview: El Bario es el alma de la ciudad donde encontrarás de todo, discotecas, tiendas, supermercados, restaurantes a pies de la calle.  Es muy popular pero también bastante seguro. The Bario is the soul of the city where you will find everything, nightclubs, shops, supermarkets, restaurants at the foot of the street. It is very popular but also quite safe.
notes: Tenemos servicios de aeropuertos. Cobraremos 30€ por recogerle o llevarle al aeropuerto!
transit: Dirección : RAMBLA RAVAL 11 3 FLOOR 1 APARTMENT 08001 BARCELONA - ESPAÑA  La mejor forma de llegar desde el aeropuerto hasta al apartamento es mediante el taxi. En taxi son 35/40€.  Tardan 20 min. - En Bus A1 o A2 llegarán hasta Plaza Catalunya y son unos 7€. Tardan 30 min hasta Placa Catalunya y luego andando hasta el apartamento son 12 min.  - En Tren hasta Sants Estacion + L3 Metro hasta parada Liceo + andando 5 min hasta el apartamento. - The best way to get from the airport to the apartment is by taxi. By taxi are € 35/40€. It takes 20 min. - In Bus A1 or A2 you will reach Plaza Catalunya and it is about € 7. It takes 30 min to Placa Catalunya and then walking to the apartment is 12 min. - By Train to Sants Station + L3 Metro to Liceo stop + 5 min walk to the apartment.
access: No hay zona comunes!  Solo es un pequeño rellano para acceso a la puerta de entrada del apartamento. El espacio esta vigilado con camera video.

name: Double room, facing the sea. CCIB
summary: Welcome to Barcelona! Come and stay in a design apartment, HOME SHARED, very clean, spacious and well maintained, located in a safe and friendly neighborhood, located in the exclusive luxury complex of the Illa del Llac, in Diagonal Mar. The floors are marble and the cozy room, very bright and sunny, has double bed, with mattress and pillows in viscolastic and security lock.
space: A luxurious space with terrace, high, very bright and sunny. Reinforced door. The apartment has several rooms. I live here, I share apartment and rent this room. Having the opportunity to stay in someone's home, allows you to better take the pulse of the character and customs of the local population through interaction and the bond that originates with the host that hosts you. Get the security of a hotel, with the comfort of a home.
description: Welcome to Barcelona! Come and stay in a design apartment, HOME SHARED, very clean, spacious and well maintained, located in a safe and friendly neighborhood, located in the exclusive luxury complex of the Illa del Llac, in Diagonal Mar. The floors are marble and the cozy room, very bright and sunny, has double bed, with mattress and pillows in viscolastic and security lock. A luxurious space with terrace, high, very bright and sunny. Reinforced door. The apartment has several rooms. I live here, I share apartment and rent this room. Having the opportunity to stay in someone's home, allows you to better take the pulse of the character and customs of the local population through interaction and the bond that originates with the host that hosts you. Get the security of a hotel, with the comfort of a home. Spacious and bright living room with access to covered terrace. Bathroom with shower. Kitchen with appliances. High speed fiber optic internet (1000 GB symmetric cable, normal Wifi and
neighborhood_overview: Next to the emblematic shopping center of Diagonal Mar and the Forum area, it is located in the area of the coastal promenade, 300 meters from the beach (3 minutes walking). 5 minutes walk to the CCIB and 10 minutes to the Port Forum. It is surrounded by many fun and delicious restaurants.
notes: It has decalcified water for the whole apartment and osmotic water to drink. A complete set of clean towels is delivered and I offer abundant amenities that include shampoo, body wash, hair dryer and breakfast.
transit: 5 minutes walk to metro L4 (Yellow), which brings you, in just 20 minutes, to the city center. 3 minutes walk to the tram. Free public parking available. HOW TO GET HOME FROM THE AIRPORT It's very easy: take the Aerobus from the airport to Barcelona for € 5.90, a quick and direct 30-minute trip. Get off at the last stop - Plaça Catalunya. Option # 1: from Plaza Catalunya take the 'Metro Plaça Urquinaona' (L4 Yellow Line) to the El Maresme-Forum metro station (15 min.) One tip, buy T10 (10 tickets on public transport in Barcelona) Around € 10 Option # 2: from Plaça Catalunya, take a taxi for around € 12. A tip, take the taxi at the corner of Portal del Ángel and Plaça Catalunya, just in front of the Telefónica-Movistar building. It is the fastest way. Another option is to take a Taxi from the airport, the cost is around € 31 Aerobus € 5.90 + Metro € 1 (T10) 1h Approx. Aerobus € 5.90 + Taxi € 12 approx. 40 min Approx. Taxi € 31 approx. 19 min. Approx. To calculate taxi routes and prices:
access: Spacious and bright living room with access to covered terrace. Bathroom with shower. Kitchen with appliances. High speed fiber optic internet (1000 GB symmetric cable, normal Wifi and 5Ghz Wifi),  NETFLIX. Two elevators at street level. In the communal area there is a swimming pool for adults and another pool for children, both surrounded by sun loungers. Gym and children's area. 24 hour surveillance.
interaction: I give my guests independence, but I am available if they need me.
house_rules: - Una habitación en un apartamento compartido no es un hotel, así que cada uno lava sus cosas y mantiene unas mínimas normas de convivencia y de respeto hacia los demás: - Nos encantan los animales, pero no en casa por razones de limpieza y seguridad. - No está permitido fumar. - No se admiten eventos ni invitados. No se admiten fiestas, pudiendo perderse el depósito y siendo invitado a abandonar el apartamento inmediatamente. - Se pide discreción y respeto a los vecinos y al servicio de vigilancia. - NO LLAMAR A OTROS TIMBRES. - No hacer ruidos de las 22:00h hasta las 8:00h. No está permitido poner música en el balcón ni en las zonas comunes. - Mantener limpio y ordenado el baño, cocina y resto de zonas comunes. Tras ducharse enjuagar la ducha y retirar los cabellos. - APAGAR LAS LUCES y el AIRE ACONDICIONADO si no se usan y si se sale del apartamento. - Se proporcionan toallas a la llegada. NO USAR las toallas para ELIMINAR EL MAQUILLAJE ni para usar en la playa, traiga sus propias t

summary: Lindo apartamento com vista para o mar. Confortável apartamento com 2 quartos (1 suíte), sala, cozinha, varanda, banheiro, wireless, sol da manhã, ar condicionado. Localizado em frente a uma ciclovia arborizada, o acesso à praia é muito bom, a apenas 5 minutos a pé da praia, andar alto, apartamento tranquilo e TV a cabo. Condomínio com garagem, piscina, sauna seca e a vapor, academia, quadra poliesportiva, segurança 24h, portaria 24h e cafeteria. O apartamento fica ao lado do hotel windsor.
space: Beautiful apartment with ocean view. Comfortable apartment with 2 bedrooms (1 suite), living room, kitchen, balcony, bathroom, Wireless, ocean view, morning sun, well-ventilated, window in every room, air conditioning in all rooms. Located in front of a wooded bike path of 3.500km, access the beach is really nice, just 5 minutes walk from the beach, high floor, quiet apartment and cable TV. Condominium with garage, swimming pool, sauna and steam room, gym, poly-sports court, 24hr security, 24hr doorman, coffee shop, games room, laundry and beauty salon. Barra da Tijuca is a really nice neighborhood with one of the most beautiful beaches of Rio de Janeiro, well wooded, good restaurant, concert halls, shopping malls, bars and is the safest neighborhood in town. Sou Gustavo, formado em marketing na ESPM. Empresário no ramo de turismo. Pratico natação, surfe, tênis, mergulho e corrida. 
De bem com a vida!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: We attended a conference at Windsor Barra Hotel and the apartment was perfect for this. Only 5 minutes walk to the conference location. Very nice apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (each with shower).Very nice beach just 5 minutes walk away. I would recommend that location to my friends, if they ever visit Rio. Gus is really helpful and a perfect host. Thank you very much.

Casa spaziosa, pulita e dotata di tutti i confort come da foto e da informazioni sul sito. Presente il servizio di pulizie dal lunedì al venerdì e la WIFI gratuita (ottima!).
Presente anche lavanderia, piscina, sauna e palestra all'interno del condominio. Un po' distante dal mare (in realtà in linea d'aria è vicinissimo ma c'è necessità di attraversare un canale) e Gus mette a disposizione le card per l'uso gratuito del battello per attraversare il canale e arrivare in spiaggia (dalle 7.00 alle 21.00 tutti i giorni). Gus e la sorella sono stati ospitali fin dal primo giorno, quando nonostante fossi arrivato molto presto con l'aereo, si sono fatti trovare pronti per consegnarmi le chiavi e mostrarmi la casa e i servizi. 
E' un posto che consiglierei, soprattutto per viaggi di lavoro essendo vicino a molti Business Centre, in una zona molto tranquilla di Rio, anche se un po' distante per chi è qui per turismo.

I stayed in this apartment about 2 months. It is perfect and good located if you work in Barra. It is fully equipped and functional. 2 big rooms, wifi available and 2 bathroom. 
It is not distant from the beach and Gus provided to me a card to use the boat in front of the apartment to pass the canal. In the condo there are also swimming pool and sauna (I use it only one time), and laundry (useful and not expensive). The maid service is perfectly performed each day (holiday and weekend excluded). I will book this apartment if I will return in Rio for work. Thanks Gus!

Casa spettacolare. Sarò ripetitivo ma per il prezzo e la posizione e i servizi offerti è veramente il meglio che si può volere.
Ne ho provate altre di case a Rio ma tornando scelgo sempre questa. Tutto ottimo, posizione, servizi, efficienza della casa e dotazioni. 
Inoltre Gus ti tratta veramente al meglio.
Positivo per chi lavora la lavanderia nel condominio e la pulizia girnaliera dell'appartamento.
Grazie ancora una volta Gus per l'ospitalità

We were very very happy with our stay at Gustavo's place! We had lots of room for 4 people. It's in a safe neighborhood and only take 5 minutes to walk to an incredible beach. The maid service was great too. It was like staying in our own private hotel!

And, Gustavo is a great host! He made sure to reach out before our trip to make sure we had all of our questions answered. When we arrived, he personally met us at the place and showed us the important things - like how to get to the beach using the ferry, how to use the laundry, how to connect to the free wifi, and how to turn the TV to english speaking stations :)

If you're looking for a place to stay in Rio, I highly recommend staying here. 

Pros: close to the beach, air conditioning, wifi, satellite tv, secure building in a safe neighborhood, 2 full bathrooms, & maid service

The apartment is perfect. It has a lovely decoration (exactly as it is shown in the pictures) and has a perfect location in one of the nicest points of Barra (just a couple of blocks from the beach). Gustavo and is sister are excellent hosts.
Super consigliato per la disponibilità di Gus, per la pulizia e i servizi offerti. Comodo e accogliente. Grazie Gus, tornerei sempre!

La apartamento es exactamente igual a la descripción. El apartamento es cómodo, con linda decoración, todas las comodidades y está muy bien ubicado. Gustavo y su hermana se preocupan por que la estadía sea perfecta.

I stayed in this apartment for almost 3 months and had a great experience.  The landlords were very accommodating and easy to get a hold of.  The apartment is in one of the more upper-class neighborhoods, is located near many different shopping malls and restaurants, and is very safe.  While it isn't centrally located near the main tourist attractions, a taxi is easy to get.  If you don't feel like going far, Barra Beach is the longest beach in Rio and is only a 5 minute walk away.  Overall a great apartment!

This was a perfect place for 2 couples to stay during the Olympics. The neighbourhood seemed very safe and it was close to transport and the beach. Apartment just as described and pictured on the website. Gustavo was a great host . We arrived in the evening and didn't feel like going out in search of food. Gustavo had some wine and snacks there to welcome us.  Would recommend ?
Tudo muito bom, a localização, os anfitriões e o apartamento em si.

We had a wonderful stay. Communication with Gustavo and Renata was very prompt, easy and helpful. The apartment was lovely, very clean, spacious (with 2 bathrooms) nicely decorated and with views of the mountains and sea. The place was ideal for us. We attended a conference at the Barra Windsor Hotel. With the boat-service for residents it took us just 5 minutes to get there. Renata and Gustavo have been the most attentive and caring hosts - there was juice and breakfast for us in the fridge and Cristina looked after the place fantastically. We highly recommend this place and would love to stay there again. Gabi
Excelente espaço físico e localização. Os anfitriões são simpáticos e dispostos a ajudar.

name: milena suites 3

name: Charmant spacieux appartement au cœur du Plateau
summary: Originaire de Suisse, je vis à Montréal depuis 3 ans. J'ai emménagé dans cette appartement il y a quelques mois et je souhaite le faire partager à des personnes de confiance de passage à Montréal. Je serai ravie de vous offrir pleins de bon conseils également. Chez moi, les plantes sont vertes et la terrasse est un paradis pour observer les chats et les écureuils et prendre un bon bain de soleil. Le lit est très confortable, et le canapé aussi. Tout reste comme si c'était votre propre maison.
space: Cet appartement est un grand deux chambres. Cependant, une a été transformé en un atelier de dessin mais la pièce à vivre est très spacieuse pour pouvoir déplier le canapé lit. Il y a une table pouvant accueillir jusqu'à 12 couverts. Chaque élément de décoration a été dessiné ou créé de mes 10 doigts.
