reviews.comments:
Nos ha encantado el alojamiento de Antonio.
Cuando llegamos nos estaba esperando Antonio, el propietario, que fue encantador con toda la familia, y al poco tiempo llegó Paula que nos enseñó la casa y nos facilitó un plano de la ciudad y nos hizo recomendaciones sobre los sitios que debíamos visitar así como sobre los mejores lugares para comer e ir de compras, transporte, etc, y tras ello tuvo el detalle de acercarnos al centro de Oporto en su propio coche (gracias Paula). 
En cuanto al alojamiento, está muy bien y es tal como aparece en las fotos.
Es una vivienda situada el el Foz de Oporto, muy cerca de la rivera del Duero, y a 10 minutos del centro en coche. Cerca de la casa hay varias paradas de bus y una de tranvía, además hay algunas tiendas y cafeterías, y relativamente cerca hay varios supermercados (Lidl, Continente...)
La casa se encuentra en una calle vecinal donde se aparca fácilmente y de forma segura.
La vivienda está recién reformada con muy buen gusto, consta de una estancia principal con salón y cocina tipo office bien equipada (incluso había alimentos para el desayuno), en la parte de salón hay un sofá cama, una habitación principal con cama de matrimonio, aseo con ducha y un pequeño cuarto con un espejo perchero donde dejar las maletas o el carrito del niño. La casa está fenomenal y es perfecta para pasar unos días en Oporto.

Como puntos a tener en cuenta:

-Casa en muy buen estado. 
-Buena situación. 
-Transporte público cercano. 
-Flexibilidad en las horas de llegada y salida.
-Casero muy atento.
-Facilidad de aparcamiento.

En definitiva, el alojamiento es 100% recomendable, y cuando regresemos a Oporto repetiremos seguro.

Otimo apartamento, minuncisamente equipado. Localizado muito próxima ao rio Tejo. A Paula nos deu dicas precisas dos pontos históricos e locais de gastronomia local excelentes. Fácil acesso ao centro de autocarro ou elétrico. Nossa estadia foi fantástica!

name: Charming Hart of Mile-End/Plateau
summary: This is a baby friendly place.  You will find my place very homy.  The apartment is conveniently located in the Mile-End/Plateau, steps from Outremont and the Mont-Royal mountain.  The garden will be your holiday highlight.  Enjoy your stay!
space: The apartment has been recently renovated, so it feels modern and bright.  Calm colours, natural wood, plants, trendy furniture.   Open concept open-kitchen fully equipped. Dining room with a table for 6.     In total 3 rooms.  One master bedroom, with a double size bed.  One office, which can be easily converted to a bedroom (pull out bed) with its sliding door.  One baby room with all you need for your baby's comfort.    Very large bathroom with 5'' tub, separate shower. A must have during summer time is a garden. The apartment is located on the first floor of a triplex.  The garden has lots of roses and many other plant which makes it very nice.  There is a large patio with table and chairs.  It can also be used as a parking space as well, if you are a skilled driver and have a mid-size car.

neighborhood_overview: The location really can't be beat. In the hart of Mile-End, you are steps away from famous St-Viateur and Fairmount.  Steps away from trendy Outremont and Laurier St.  You are so close to all the best of what Montreal has to offer: Saint-Laurent, Av. Mont Royal, Parc Ave, Jeanne Mance park, all the best cafes and restaurants including the outstanding Le Filet, Buvette Chez Simone.   Easy transport (quick bike ride, or 10 minute straight shot on the 80 bus) to the Quartier des spectacles, Jazz Fest, Downtown.
access: Amenities: Wifi, washer/dryer, dishwasher, air conditioning, TV with cable.
house_rules: No smoking, no pets, quiet place.

host.host_about: Love travelling and discovering new places.

reviews.comments: Très bel appartement, spacieux, propreté impeccable. Il est très bien situé, dans un endroit à la fois calme et proche de nombreux commerces. À 10 minutes du centre en vélo. La propriétaire est fort sympathique et les chats des voisins de bonne compagnie.

Appartement très charmant et très agréable à vivre. Il est idéalement placé à Montréal avec ou sans voiture! On peut finalement se garer sans trop de problème ou bien découvrir le mille end ou le Plateau à pied. L'accueil est vraiment très sympathique de la part d'Alphee. Nous avons profité de ses herbes aromatiques de son petit jardin. Avec nos deux enfants, nous nous sommes sentis comme à la maison. Je recommande vivement ce logement sans hésitation.

We cannot say enough good things about Alphee's beautiful apartment. Bright, clean, modern and well located near many great restaurants, markets and parks. The apartment is equipped with fabulous touches such as a huge jetted tub, an high quality music system, an espresso machine, and excellent AC- a rarity in Montreal! The back garden is a lush oasis to relax in and enjoy an al fresco meal. The surrounding neighbors are friendly yet give plenty of privacy.

Alphee was very responsive, nice, and easy to communicate with. She made our entire family, including our children, feel welcomed into her lovely home.  We would stay there again without hesitation. Thank you so much for your hospitality, Alphee!

Our stay was wonderful and very welcoming, thanks to this lovely house. It truly felt like a home. Our 2 young girls loved playing with all the toys. Everything in the home was as described and the location was superb! 

Merci, Alphee!

alphee est super disponible, bonne communication, son appartement est génial, super bien placé et calme, tous les commerces se trouvent à proximité, c'était le top. nous avons adoré.
merci à alphee.

My family visits Montreal every year, and I can honestly say that Alphee's home is the best we have stayed in Montreal partly due to the fact that we truly felt at home. I came to find that we share similar interests(such as our love for plants!) and a healthy, balanced lifestyle. Thank you so much for sharing your beautiful space with us. We can only hope to stay in your home again when we visit next year and finally meet you and your sweet daughter!

Located on the main street of the neighborhood, with direct access to Lapa. Security, tranquility and privacy. Garden with fruit trees and unobstructed. neighborhood_overview: Estar localizado entre Santa Teresa e Lapa nos concede as facilidades de usufruir do melhor deles sem sofrer com os inconvinientes. Subindo a rua, chega-se à Santa Teresa e desfruta-se das lojas, restaurantes e ateliês descolados de arte. Descendo os antigos degraus chega-se à Lapa com suas muitas opções de casas noturnas com músicas para todos os gostos.
transit: Santa Teresa conta com a única rede de bondes da cidade, atualmente desativada para adequação. Na Lapa, duas quadras descendo, há ônibus e táxis para toda a cidade, A poucos metros, duas estações do metrô.  Auxiliamos com transporte para ida e volta dos aeroportos.
access: Estamos abraçados por um simpático jardim e por estar acima do nível da rua, uma bela vista de parte do Centro da cidade.
interaction: Estamos sempre em casa, na parte superior do imóvel, onde recebemos para um café ou um pequeno lanche tipicamente brasileiro.
house_rules: Gostar de animais (a casa tem cachorro de pequeno porte) Não é permitida a presença de não hóspedes (é vedada a entrada de convidados). Fumar é permitido na área externa. As luzes e aparelhos elétricos e eletrônicos devem ser desligados ao sair. O bairro é uma área de proteção ambiental, recomendamos o uso de repelente.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Somos um casal, um historiador e outro restaurador/artista plástico.
Vivemos na casa dos nossos sonhos, no bairro dos nossos sonhos,
na cidade dos sonhos de muitos. Entre livros, amigos e nossos cães.
Gostamos de conhecer pessoas, fazer novas amizades, turismo cultural, gastronomia, artes plásticas, arte urbana, arquitetura...
Recebemos como gostamos de ser recebidos: com carinho, atenção e respeito.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A beautiful retreat in an energetic, exciting city, Eduardo and Raimundo were the hosts that dreams are made of. The apartment itself is nestled conveniently between Lapa and Santa Theresa two of the most exciting, interesting and artistic areas of Rio. Our wonderful hosts not only told us about secret gems of places to visit not highlighted by any guidebook, they also left us food from their supper when we got in after dancing til the early hours of the morning. The apartment is safe, spacious and clean with a great view of the city. If you are visiting Rio I insist you stay here.

Nice Flat, Lovely Place and Great Hosts.
Sanat Teresa is a perfect place for young people and located close to Lapa (2mins by walk)
Thank you Eduardo & Raimundo

Eduardo and Raimundo were lovely hosts. They were very welcoming and gave us great help in negotiating Rio during the new year period. The apartment has great character and is in a great location - in beautiful Santa Teresa and close to bustling Lapa. We had a wonderful time staying here.

A great stay in a fabulous location. We felt safe staying with Eduardo and Raimundo during a hectic time in the city. They also brought us goodies which was a nice touch. I would definitely recommend this studio due to its great hosts and location, the Santa Teresa district is really worth a visit!

Eduardo & Raimundo are lovely hosts! After 15 days of Rio, they were our last stop before flyer back to Europe and that was a good choice. We enjoyed staying at their beautiful house in the middle of the fine Santa Teresa area and we felt very much the way they take care about their guests. Our stay was short, just one night, but enough to take nice en happy memories of Rio and the cariocas with us back home.

Eduardo & Raimundo are great host and they helped us in getting in touch with the true Carioca spirit! The apartment is located in a good position between Lapa and Santa Tereza districts and the view from the terrace is spectacular.
The flat in itself is ok for a short stay, bright-coloured, simple, located at the lower level of their house. Sufficiently spacious yet not particularly illuminated. Maybe in the spartan bathroom a better shower courtain could help :-)

Our stay was wonderful! The apartment is charming and well equipped, the building is beautiful and this area of Santa Teresa is perfectly located near night life of Lapa and buses to other parts of Rio. Eduardo & Raimundo were perfect hosts and the champagne for New Years was lovely!

Eduardo and Raimundo are very friendly and nice guys. They helped us with everything we needed. Even though it was only one night we enjoyed Santa Teresa. It was only a few blocks above Lapa where we enjoyed a nice dinner. I would have liked to have more time to talk with Eduardo and Raimundo and a tour of their beautiful house. Maybe next time.
Thank you guys!

Eduardo & Raimundo are the perfect hosts in every way.  Communication, prior to and during our stay was excellent.  Nothing was too much trouble for them and they made sure that our stay was as comfortable as possible.  They are also very passionate about the local community and it's fantastic culture.  They provide us with lots of useful information and recommendations about places to visit based on our discussions with them (we managed to communicate easily despite our limited Portuguese). 

The apartment has been decorated and furnished in an imaginative way, making very good use of the space available and is very comfortable and light.  We felt very much at home immediately.  The hosts also added little touches which made us feel very welcome, including some provisions e.g. fresh fruit and drinks.  There is also a large external terrace area where you can sit and relax, with great views of Santa Teresa and the surrounding area.

The accommodation is located on a quiet street within 5 minutes walk of both the centre of Santa Teresa and Lapa, which both have plentiful bars, restaurants, galleries and other cultural sights that can be explored.  Public transport, both bus and metro, is easily accessible in Lapa, as too are taxis.  

We felt very safe within the area and would recommend the studio as a great base for exploring Rio.  

If we return to Rio, we would definitely stay at the studio and we will stay in contact with Eduardo & Raimundo, who are exceptionally generous hosts, who we now regard as friends.

Eduardo and Raimundo provided us with the best hospitality we had in the whole 2 weeks of being in Brasil for the world cup! 
The beds were comfortable and Lapa provided plenty of options for good food and Entertainment. The apartment is close enough to the metro as well as being away from the hustle of Vila.
Saudade Brasil! Saudade Cachaca!

Que grande prazer de ficar com Eudardo & Raimundo! Risonhos, sympaticos, prestativos .. foi momentos otimos! Obrigado ^^ E a casa é fantastica! Si voce quer ficar em um lugar no Rio, vai le encontrar ^^ Obrigado amigos, muito obrigado!

The best place I've ever been in Rio, go for it! Eduardo e Raimundo are just great ^^ A real pleasure!

Eduardo is very friendly, easy going and always ready to help and give indications and recommendations on how to make the most of the cidade maravilhosa!
The apartment is consistent with the pictures and the bohemian style of Santa Teresa.
The bathroom and kitchen are quite tight, but Eduardo told us he is planning on making some improvement there.
Very well located, I recommend it.
Thank you Eduardo e Raimundo até mais!

Plus que les bienvenus nous étions à la maison.
Le logement conforme aux photos parfait pour notre séjour à Rio,
L'accueil avec le petit déjeuner préparé par Raimundo super,on s'est senti chez nous de suite, merci pour ce noêl et ce nouvel an passés avec vous et vos amis, Eduardo nous a aidé à préparer nos visites, bus endroit à visiter où manger ( restaurant gomez super il faut absolument goûter le manioc frit) . Nous avons rencontré des anges.
Ce voyage restera inoubliable grâce à Eduardo et Raimundo, ce sont des hôtes exceptionnels. Merci pour tout et vive le Brésil .
Dépaysement assuré. Nous y retournerons dés que possible et le logement se sera biensûr chez Eduardo et Raimundo

Wow! This little oasis was beautiful! An adorable little flat located a block from the downtown Lapa scene.  Located on a charming little hill, you have to climb some stairs but that will help to work off all the food and drink you will consume in Lapa.  

Eduardo and Raimundo are so darling! They welcomed us with little snacks of cheese and ham sandwhiches, and in the fridge was cold Brasilian Beer! What a treat.  And later, Eduardo brought us some soup. It was so sweet.
It couldn't be better : lovely guests, lovely flat in a lovely neighbourhood. I wish we could stay longer ! Raimundo & Eduardo did their best to help and make us feel comfortable.

Eduardo and Raimundo are wonderful hosts with a terrific home. They were easy to communicate with and provided lots of great recommendations. The house is just a few minutes walk from the heart of Lapa where there are plenty of bars and restaurants, as well as easy access to public transit. The apartment is nicely furnished and decorated and was very clean. Definitely a great choice!

Very cute apartment, in a neighborhood full of personality, a few minutes walk to lively nightlife and bus to elsewhere in the city. We met only quickly with Eduardo and Raimundo but they were very welcoming and we immediately felt at home. A big thanks.

Para quien desee visitar Santa Teresa, Lapa y el  centro de Río deben saber que Eduardo y Raimundo son formidables anfitriones. Su apartamento tiene lo esencial para la estancia y un gran espacio para relajarse después de un día agitado. Tuvieron la amabilidad de recibirnos muy temprano con un café y un cálido recibimiento. Nos dieron consejos de lugares de acuerdo a nuestros intereses y gustos.  Tuvimos oportunidad de conversar con ellos, lo que nos hizo sentir menos turistas. En el par de días en su casa conocimos la gentileza carioca y bahiana. 

Para as pessoas que tenham a vontade de visitar Santa Teresa, Lapa e o Centro do Río, devem saber que Eduardo e Raimundo sao formidáveis anfitriões. O seu apartamento tem o essencial para a estancia e um grande espaço para se relazar depois de um dia agitado. elem tiveram a amabilidade de nós recibir muito cedo con café e uma ótima recepção. Eles aconselharam a gente de acordo com nosso interesses. Tivemos a oportunidade de conversam com eles, o que nós fez sentir menos turistas e mais como velhos amigos. Nos días que estivemos na sua casa conhecimos a gentileza paulista e bahiana.

Eduardo and Raimondo were absolutely fantastic hosts- so kind, friendly and generous. They did everything to make us feel welcome and looked after. The apartment is beautiful and in a great location. We were there for  carnival and had the best time - watching the parade from the balcony was a highlight! I would highly recommend the apartment.

Eduardo and Raimundo were excellent hosts. Such warm and loving people. They made sure our trip was as comfortable as possible and provided great restaurant recommendations. My and sister and I felt right at home. The apartment is in a great location and only a short walk to Lapa. I would definitely recommend staying here!

host.host_about: I am german, 31 years old and I live in Barcelona for one year already. As I love traveling and spending time in nice and cosy places I want to offer the same to other people. We are three young working people who share this amazing flat and we are looking forward to meeting new people from all over the world. Here you will find a quiet place in the center of Eixample, one of the most beautiful districts of Barcelona.

name: Top 2 Rooms Apartment w Parking, close Douro River

host.host_about:
Somos um casal de brasileiros que adotou o Porto como nova morada. Desde o Brasil, sempre gostamos de receber, e a experiência de ter hóspedes em nossa nova casa em Portugal tem sido gratificante e enriquecedora. 
Adoramos viajar, portanto compartilhar histórias e ouvir as dos nossos hóspedes é maravilhoso. Seja bem-vindo!

We are a couple of Brazilians who have adopted Porto as our new home. Since we lived in Brazil, we always like to receive, and the experience of having guests in our new house in Portugal has been gratifying and enriching.
We love traveling, so sharing stories and listening to our guests is wonderful. Welcome!

neighborhood_overview: The laid-back Le Plateau area is known as a young, student-friendly neighborhood with streets full of charming townhouses. Avenue du Mont-Royal and Rue Saint-Denis are lined with casual cafes, laid-back eateries, busy bars, and contemporary galleries and theatres. Nearby, Mount Royal Park has popular trails, a lake and views from its namesake mountain. Lawns surround the ponds at tranquil Parc La Fontaine.
notes: Neighbourhood: The condo is located in the upscale hip La Plateau borough. Where murals by local artisans adorn the buildings creating a unique vibe. The neighbourhood is 10 minutes from downtown Montreal and due to proximity to subway, public busses and BIXI bike stations getting around is easy.
transit: Bus (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) all service our area. They all take you to the metro system.  Closest metro station is Laurier on the Orange line.
access: Guest have access to the entire condo and all 3 outdoor patios.
interaction: I am available throughout your stay and will respond immediately to any concerns or needs you might have.  I have an assistant that is available in person.

host.host_about: Thank you for taking the time to check out my listing. This is an unbeatable location in the Le Plateau neighbourhood of Montreal.   I will make sure that during your stay you get any assistance you may need and I will make sure all your necessities are taken care of. I am able to communicate in English and French. Please feel free to contact me anytime if you have any question. Looking forward to hear from you.

reviews.comments: 挺好的,卫生干净,什么设施都有,安全也不错,有工作人员,入住很简单,比想象中要好,而且很安静,不打扰,第一次尝试,有意思｡
非常满意……

This is a capsule hotel. As I currently live in Japan, I’m used to this style of hotel.

It’s in a great location - right by the exit of the station so very easy to get around. 

The host is excellent - very quick to answer questions - I had a little trouble finding the place but after a quick phone call I got some directions and all was sorted. 

The common areas are excellent and toilets are Japanese style ie wash functionality. 

The capsule itself is comfortable however remember to bring an eye mask and earplugs so you aren’t disturbed. Thankfully I brought these items with me. In Japanese capsule hotels these are complimentary so perhaps these could be provided for those who haven’t got these items. 

FYI There is no ‘daily housekeeping’ so towels / sheets are not replaced during your stay. Unfortunately there is nowhere to dry your towel - drying yourself with a damp towel each day was bearable but not particularly pleasant! Please provide somewhere to dry towels effectively, otherwise provide fresh towels daily. 

Overall I had a good stay and would stay again if I needed somewhere to stay in Hong Kong.

if you're looking for a night's rest in a clean environment with showers, lockers and your own enclosed capsule, this is the place for you. great location in tst and the check-in/out was simple and convenient. the place is air conditioned and the rules in place contributed to a quiet, private and comfortable stay. would stay again!
